original: @170b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @170b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: pra d'i po d'i pa ti prit ko hrid y'a darsha na n'a ma /
analyzed: pra d'i po d'i pa ti prit ko hrid y'a darsha na n'a ma /
translated: Pradipoddyotana-tīkā-hṛdaya-ādarśa-nāma.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: sgron ma gsal ba mdor bshad pa'i sa bcad snying gi me long zhes bya ba /
analyzed: sgron ma gsal ba mdor bshad pa'i sa bcad snying gi me long zhes bya ba /
translated: The Heart Mirror: An Outline of the Illuminating Lamp.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva.🔽The one who abides pervading the bodies

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams la //🔽gang zhig sku yis khyab byed gnas //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams la // gang zhig sku yis khyab byed gnas //
translated: of the five thus-gone ones,

original: rdo rje 'chang ba'i gtso bo ni //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba'i gtso bo ni //
translated: the chief of vajra holders,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen de la 'dud //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen de la 'dud //
translated: I bow to that great Vajradhara.

original: mtha' drug ces bya'i 'grel pa ni //
analyzed: mtha' drug ces bya'i 'grel pa ni //
translated: The commentary called The Six Limits

original: dpal ldan zla ba'i grags pas mdzad //🔽dka' ba'i gnas la bdag gis ni //
analyzed: dpal ldan zla ba'i grags pas mdzad // dka' ba'i gnas la bdag gis ni //
translated: was composed by the glorious Candrakīrti.🔽I will now make an analysis

original: rnam par dbye ba'i rnam 'grel bya //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba'i rnam 'grel bya //
translated: of the difficult points.

original: de la dpal ldan rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
analyzed: de la dpal ldan rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
translated: Here, by the phrase the glorious king of tantras,

original: 'dod pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal ba yin no //
translated: homage is paid to the desired deity.

original: de la rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni rgyud gzhan rnams las khyad par du gyur pa'i don to //
analyzed: de la rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni rgyud gzhan rnams las khyad par du gyur pa'i don to //
translated: The phrase king of tantras means it is superior to other tantras.

original: shin tu gsal bar rnam par phye //
analyzed: shin tu gsal bar rnam par phye //
translated: and very clearly distinguished.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi khyad par gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi khyad par gyis so //
translated: This is by the special Yoga Tantras.

original: gal te de lta na de nyid grub pa'i phyir 'bad pa ci zhig dgos zhes pa la /
analyzed: gal te de lta na de nyid grub pa'i phyir 'bad pa ci zhig dgos zhes pa la /
translated: If it is so, then why is effort necessary for the accomplishment of that?

original: mtha' drug gi ni bcing bas bcings pas zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: mtha' drug gi ni bcing bas bcings pas zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: It is said, “bound by the binding of the six limits. ”

original: 'o na yang de nyid las /
analyzed: 'o na yang de nyid las /
translated: But then, from that very (scripture):

original: khyod kyis rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: khyod kyis rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: “You will understand it.”

original: yang rgol ba de nyid kyis na rgyal sras yul gyur zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: yang rgol ba de nyid kyis na rgyal sras yul gyur zhes gsungs so //
translated: Again, by that very objection, it is said, “the object of the Victor’s sons. ”

original: 'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob pa rnams kyis 'grel pa bya bar 'os pa yin no zhes bsams so //
analyzed: 'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob pa rnams kyis 'grel pa bya bar 'os pa yin no zhes bsams so //
translated: This means that it is proper for those who have attained the superknowledges to compose commentaries.

original: de ltar yang dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag las bstan te /
analyzed: de ltar yang dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag las bstan te /
translated: Thus it is taught in the Kālacakra Awn of Instructions:

original: mngon par shes pa thob pas 'grel pa bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa thob pas 'grel pa bya'o zhes so //
translated: “One who has attained the superknowledges should compose a commentary. ”

original: de'i mtshan ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i mtshan ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the name of that (scripture)?

original: rgyal ba'i 'dus gang yin zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i 'dus gang yin zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said, “the gathering of the Victor’s (sons). ”

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams kyi 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams kyi 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the term “assembly” is that the five transcendent ones are assembled.

original: 'o na de la re zhig ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'di dag gi tshogs 'dus pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de la re zhig ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'di dag gi tshogs 'dus pa yin zhe na /
translated: Now, how are these transcendent ones assembled there?

original: bshad pa'i rim pa gnyis te /
analyzed: bshad pa'i rim pa gnyis te /
translated: There are two stages of explanation:

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //🔽de la bskyed pa'i rim pa la ni /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o // de la bskyed pa'i rim pa la ni /
translated: the stage of generation and the stage of completion.

original: zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / sa bon dang / phyag mtshan dang / spro ba dang / bsdu ba dang / sku grub pa rnams kyi mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga ni /
analyzed: zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / sa bon dang / phyag mtshan dang / spro ba dang / bsdu ba dang / sku grub pa rnams kyi mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga ni /
translated: Among them, the five manifest enlightenments of the moon, sun, seed, insignia, emanation, and re-absorption, and the creation of the body,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo nyid 'dus pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo nyid 'dus pa yin no //
translated: are the assembly of the nature of the five transcendent ones.

original: yang na sku grub pa la gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu zhugs pa ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: yang na sku grub pa la gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu zhugs pa ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: Or, the “assembly” is the entry of all transcendent ones into the creation of the body.

original: yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa ni dga' ba dam pa'i chags pa'i sgras rgyal ba'i tshogs mtha' dag rab tu zhugs pa'i 'og tu /
analyzed: yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa ni dga' ba dam pa'i chags pa'i sgras rgyal ba'i tshogs mtha' dag rab tu zhugs pa'i 'og tu /
translated: Again, the entry into union of means and wisdom in the completion stage is the entry of the entire host of victors by the sound of passion for sublime bliss.

original: @171a * // rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor gcig tu zhu ba'i ngo bo byang chub kyi sems thig le'i rang bzhin du 'dus pa yin no //
analyzed: @171a * // rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor gcig tu zhu ba'i ngo bo byang chub kyi sems thig le'i rang bzhin du 'dus pa yin no //
translated: After that, the bodhicitta, which is the essence of the single melted state at the tip of the vajra jewel, is gathered into the nature of the bindu.

original: yang na rdo rje'i lam nas spros nas /
analyzed: yang na rdo rje'i lam nas spros nas /
translated: Or else, having emanated through the vajra path,

original: byang chub kyi sems thig le'i dkyil 'khor na yod pa'i lha'i gzugs kyi padma'i snying po'i nang na rab tu yod pa ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems thig le'i dkyil 'khor na yod pa'i lha'i gzugs kyi padma'i snying po'i nang na rab tu yod pa ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: the bodhicitta is gathered into the essence of the lotus of the deity’s form in the bindu maṇḍala.

original: yang na phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su tshangs pa'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slob ma la zhugs par byas pa de ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: yang na phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su tshangs pa'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slob ma la zhugs par byas pa de ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: Or else, at the time of the empowerment of irreversibility, all tathāgatas enter the disciple through the brahma aperture. That is the gathering.

original: 'di dag ni mtshon pa tsam ste /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mtshon pa tsam ste /
translated: These are mere examples.

original: rnam pa gzhan ni gzhung mangs kyis dogs pa'i 'jigs pas ma bstan no //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan ni gzhung mangs kyis dogs pa'i 'jigs pas ma bstan no //
translated: Other aspects are not mentioned for fear of being too wordy.

original: brgyud pa ma gtogs par ni de kho na nyid rtogs pa med pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: brgyud pa ma gtogs par ni de kho na nyid rtogs pa med pa de'i phyir /
translated: Apart from the lineage, there is no realization of reality.

original: de ni dpal klu sgrub las thos pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni dpal klu sgrub las thos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it was heard from the glorious Nāgārjuna.

original: rim pa gnyis la zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'dus pa nyid kyi rnam par 'grel pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis la zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'dus pa nyid kyi rnam par 'grel pa'o //
translated: By two stages, he comments on the very collection.

original: gal te yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa ni rim pa rnam pa lngar bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa ni rim pa rnam pa lngar bstan pa yin te /
translated: Although the glorious Guhyasamāja is taught in five stages,

original: 'on kyang de bsdu pa'i don du yongs su brtags pas rim pa gnyis su bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de bsdu pa'i don du yongs su brtags pas rim pa gnyis su bstan pa yin no //
translated: nevertheless, for the purpose of collecting it, it is taught in two stages by thorough examination.

original: shin tu gsang ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu gsang ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the utmost secrecy,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyas btab pa yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyas btab pa yin te /
translated: it is sealed by all buddhas,

original: rgyal po rnams kyi rang gi mdzod bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyal po rnams kyi rang gi mdzod bzhin no //
translated: like the personal treasury of kings.

original: btung pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid de'i bdag nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: btung pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid de'i bdag nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa'o //
translated: Drinking is the engagement in the nature of body, speech, and mind.

original: khyab pa bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: khyab pa bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa'i khyad par ro //
translated: The pervasive self is the distinction of Vajrasattva.

original: rab tu gsal bar bshad pa ni rab tu ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu gsal bar bshad pa ni rab tu ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The very clear explanation is the one who shows.

original: zla ba'i grags pas zhes bya ba ni gzhung byed pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: zla ba'i grags pas zhes bya ba ni gzhung byed pa'i tshig go //
translated: The words Candrakirti and so on are the words of the author of the treatise.

original: 'di dag gi ni klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyi slob ma yin pa nyid kyis man ngag dang ldan pa nyid du rab tu bstan no //
analyzed: 'di dag gi ni klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyi slob ma yin pa nyid kyis man ngag dang ldan pa nyid du rab tu bstan no //
translated: It is taught that they are endowed with the precepts because they are disciples of Nagarjuna.

original: rim pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rim pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The word stages

original: bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means the stages of creation and so on.

original: gsang sngags sku zhes bya ba nas //
analyzed: gsang sngags sku zhes bya ba nas //
translated: The words mantra body and so on🔽indicate the stage of union.

original: bden pa gnyis kyi sbyor byed gang //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi sbyor byed gang //
translated: The words which is the union of the two truths🔽indicate the stage of clear light.

original: 'di ni sgrub pa'i yan lag mchog / ces bya ba'i bar gyi ni /
analyzed: 'di ni sgrub pa'i yan lag mchog / ces bya ba'i bar gyi ni /
translated: The words this is the best limb of practice

original: rdo rje bzlas pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / rang byin gyis brlab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / zung du 'brel pa'i rim pa rnams rab tu bstan no//
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / rang byin gyis brlab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / zung du 'brel pa'i rim pa rnams rab tu bstan no//
translated: indicate the stage of illusory body.

original: rgyud kun gyi ni don bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud kun gyi ni don bsdus pa'o //
translated: The words the meaning of all the tantras🔽indicate the five stages.🔽The words the best limb of practice

original: zhes bya ba 'dis ni rim pa lnga las lhag pa dang chad pa nyid rab tu dgag pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis ni rim pa lnga las lhag pa dang chad pa nyid rab tu dgag pa yin no //
translated: indicate the five stages.🔽The words the meaning of all the tantras🔽indicate the five stages.

original: dbye ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par spros pa'o //
analyzed: dbye ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par spros pa'o //
translated: The division is the analysis.

original: de la rdo rje bzlas pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa mang po yin no //
analyzed: de la rdo rje bzlas pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa mang po yin no //
translated: Therein, the stage of vajra repetition is manifold by the division of Vairochana, etc.

original: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa ni ye shes @171b gsum la sogs pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa ni ye shes @171b gsum la sogs pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: The stage of mind-purification is by the division of the three intuitions, etc.

original: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ni /
analyzed: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ni /
translated: The stage of self-consecration

original: mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i dbye bas so //
translated: is by the division of the five enlightenments.

original: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa ni chags pa dang / chags pa med pa dang / chags pa bar ma'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa ni chags pa dang / chags pa med pa dang / chags pa bar ma'i dbye bas so //
translated: The stage of manifest enlightenment is by the division of passion, non-passion, and middling passion.

original: zung du 'brel pa'i rim pa ni kun rdzob dang / don dam pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: zung du 'brel pa'i rim pa ni kun rdzob dang / don dam pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: The stage of union is by the division of the conventional and the ultimate.

original: de rnams yang dag par bsdus pa ni zhes bya ba ni gang lnga po gcig tu zung du 'jug pa'i rim par yang dag par 'du ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams yang dag par bsdus pa ni zhes bya ba ni gang lnga po gcig tu zung du 'jug pa'i rim par yang dag par 'du ba'o //
translated: The perfect inclusion of those is the inclusion of the five in the stage of union.

original: rgyud rig ste zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i bla ma khams gsum na rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud rig ste zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i bla ma khams gsum na rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The knower of tantra is the guru of the world, who reveals the state of Vajradhara in the three realms.

original: sngags dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rim pa rnams kyi bsdus pa'i don no //
analyzed: sngags dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rim pa rnams kyi bsdus pa'i don no //
translated: The mantra and so forth indicate the summarized meaning of the stages.

original: sngags smos pas ni sngags thams cad yi ge gsum gyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: sngags smos pas ni sngags thams cad yi ge gsum gyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i tshig go //
translated: By mentioning mantra, all mantras are included in the three syllables.

original: sems kyi sgras ni sems las byung ba brgya drug cu'i rang bzhin bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: sems kyi sgras ni sems las byung ba brgya drug cu'i rang bzhin bzung ba yin no //
translated: By the word mind, the nature of the sixty-four mental factors is included.

original: lus kyi sgras ni chos dang longs spyod dang sprul pa'i sku bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi sgras ni chos dang longs spyod dang sprul pa'i sku bzung ba yin no //
translated: By the word body, the dharmakāya, sambhogakāya, and nirmāṇakāya are included.

original: rnam par dag pa smos pas ni chags pa la sogs pa dang / dga' ba la sogs pa bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa smos pas ni chags pa la sogs pa dang / dga' ba la sogs pa bzung ba yin no //
translated: By mentioning purity, attachment and so forth, and joy and so forth, are included.

original: zung 'jug las zhes bya bas ni gnyis su byar med pa bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: zung 'jug las zhes bya bas ni gnyis su byar med pa bzung ba yin no //
translated: By from the union, non-duality is included.

original: mtha' drug la 'jug go zhes bya ba ni 'chang bar 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' drug la 'jug go zhes bya ba ni 'chang bar 'gyur pa'o //
translated: The six limits are to be mastered.

original: mtha' drug po 'di yang dpal 'dus pa'i yul can yin no //
analyzed: mtha' drug po 'di yang dpal 'dus pa'i yul can yin no //
translated: These six limits are the object of the glorious Guhyasamāja.

original: de yang gcig tu yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de yang gcig tu yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: And they are of the nature of the three syllables.

original: yi ge gsum po yang a'a li dang k'a li'i sngags thams cad kyi yig 'bru dang tshig la sogs pa dbye ba rnams kyang yang dag par bsdus pa yin te //🔽des na / ya ra la wa ha mtha'i bar //
analyzed: yi ge gsum po yang a'a li dang k'a li'i sngags thams cad kyi yig 'bru dang tshig la sogs pa dbye ba rnams kyang yang dag par bsdus pa yin te // des na / ya ra la wa ha mtha'i bar //
translated: The three syllables are the complete collection of the divisions of the letters, words, and so on of all the mantras of āli and kāli.🔽Therefore, it is said:🔽“Ya, ra, la, wa, and ha at the end.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: and so on.🔽🔽

original: rim pa las rnam par 'das pa'i rgyu ni brjod par mi rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: rim pa las rnam par 'das pa'i rgyu ni brjod par mi rigs so zhe na /
translated: It is not reasonable to say that the cause of the transcendence of sequence is inexpressible.

original: dang po ya ra la wa smos pas ni las kyi sbyor ba'i nus pa sgrub pa gtso ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang po ya ra la wa smos pas ni las kyi sbyor ba'i nus pa sgrub pa gtso ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The mention of ya, ra, la, and wa first is for the sake of establishing the power of application to action.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus it is explained:

original: dngos grub 'dod pas bya ba ni //
analyzed: dngos grub 'dod pas bya ba ni //
translated: “The one who desires power should perform

original: ra la sogs pa gsum nyid kyis //
analyzed: ra la sogs pa gsum nyid kyis //
translated: the three, ra, la, and so on,🔽and engage in the benefit of beings.

original: 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug / ces bshad do //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug / ces bshad do //
translated: They are engaged in the welfare of living beings.🔽

original: ci'i phyir aa la sogs pa mi bzung zhe na //
analyzed: ci'i phyir aa la sogs pa mi bzung zhe na //
translated: Why are a and so on not taken?

original: bshad pa ; re zhig gsal bya rnams ni gsal byed med par brjod par mi nus pa yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa ; re zhig gsal bya rnams ni gsal byed med par brjod par mi nus pa yin te /
translated: The explanation: First, the manifest cannot be expressed without the manifesters.

original: de dag nye bar bzung bas dbyangs kyi yi ge rnams kyang yang dag par bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: de dag nye bar bzung bas dbyangs kyi yi ge rnams kyang yang dag par bzung ba yin no //
translated: By taking up those, the vowel letters are also taken up.

original: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The eighty-four thousand aggregates of Dharma, etc. are easy to understand.

original: de la rgyud kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba 'dis ni @172a * //
analyzed: de la rgyud kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba 'dis ni @172a * //
translated: There, this “peak of the tantra”

original: phan yon bstan no //
analyzed: phan yon bstan no //
translated: teaches the benefit.

original: gzhung nyung zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud mtha' dag gi snying por bstan to //
analyzed: gzhung nyung zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud mtha' dag gi snying por bstan to //
translated: This “few words, etc.” teaches the essence of all Yoga Tantras.

original: de la rnyed dka' shes pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: de la rnyed dka' shes pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan to //
translated: There, the words “difficult to find” teach the object to be accomplished.

original: rgyan bdun zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gtan tshigs bstan to //
analyzed: rgyan bdun zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gtan tshigs bstan to //
translated: The “seven ornaments, etc.” teach the reason.

original: de bas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bla ma brgyud pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par dbye ba la 'grel pa byed pa'i snying rje gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bla ma brgyud pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par dbye ba la 'grel pa byed pa'i snying rje gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The verse beginning Therefore... clarifies the author's compassion for the divisions of the ornament of the lineage of teachers.

original: de la gleng bslang ba la sogs pa rgyan bdun ni /
analyzed: de la gleng bslang ba la sogs pa rgyan bdun ni /
translated: Therein, the seven ornaments such as the introduction are:

original: mdor bstan pa dang / mtshan nyid dang / yongs su rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: mdor bstan pa dang / mtshan nyid dang / yongs su rtogs pa yin te /
translated: the brief indication, the characteristic, and the full understanding.

original: de ltar na 'di rnam pa gsum gyi dbang du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na 'di rnam pa gsum gyi dbang du byas pa yin no //
translated: Thus, this [treatise] is made in terms of these three aspects.

original: de la dang po bstan pa la gleng bslang ba'i grangs ni rnam pa lnga yin te /
analyzed: de la dang po bstan pa la gleng bslang ba'i grangs ni rnam pa lnga yin te /
translated: Therein, the number of introductions in the first teaching is five aspects.

original: de la gnas skabs kyi tshe don bsgrub pa'i phyir bsam pa ni gleng bslang ba nyid du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de la gnas skabs kyi tshe don bsgrub pa'i phyir bsam pa ni gleng bslang ba nyid du bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therein, the intention for the sake of accomplishing the purpose at the time of the occasion is taught as the introduction itself.

original: ji srid de'i rigs pas sgrub pa ma byas pa de srid du ni gleng bslang ba de yang 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji srid de'i rigs pas sgrub pa ma byas pa de srid du ni gleng bslang ba de yang 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
translated: As long as the proof by reasoning of that is not done, that introduction will not be accomplished.

original: de'i phyir rigs pa yang rnam pa bzhi bstan no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rigs pa yang rnam pa bzhi bstan no //
translated: Therefore, the four types of reasoning are also taught.

original: de'i 'og tu sgra dang / don gyi rnam par dbye bas rnam par bshad pa smos pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu sgra dang / don gyi rnam par dbye bas rnam par bshad pa smos pa yin no //
translated: After that, the explanation by the division of word and meaning is mentioned.

original: lnga pa ni smra ba po'i rgyan yin no //
analyzed: lnga pa ni smra ba po'i rgyan yin no //
translated: The fifth is the ornament of the speaker.

original: drug pa ni nyan pa po'i rgyan yin no //
analyzed: drug pa ni nyan pa po'i rgyan yin no //
translated: The sixth is the ornament of the listener.

original: bdun pa ni brjod par bya ba ma lus pa mtha' dag bsdus pa'i rgyan yin no //
analyzed: bdun pa ni brjod par bya ba ma lus pa mtha' dag bsdus pa'i rgyan yin no //
translated: The seventh is the ornament of the inclusion of all that is to be expressed.

original: thams cad bsdus pa ni dbye ba nyi shu rtsa brgyad do//
analyzed: thams cad bsdus pa ni dbye ba nyi shu rtsa brgyad do//
translated: The inclusion of all is the twenty-eight divisions.

original: 'di'i ming ci zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rgyan dang po'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: 'di'i ming ci zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rgyan dang po'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: The first ornament is characterized by What is its name? and so on.

original: de yang dri ba sngon du 'gro ba'i lam ni /
analyzed: de yang dri ba sngon du 'gro ba'i lam ni /
translated: Moreover, the path that precedes the question

original: rgyud kyi mtshan ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud kyi mtshan ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: is the name of the tantra, and so on.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: ming med par ni tha snyad chad pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad 'on pa dang lkugs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ming med par ni tha snyad chad pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad 'on pa dang lkugs par 'gyur te /
translated: Without a name, all beings would be deaf and mute because of the cessation of convention.

original: de bas na mtshan bzung ba yin no//
analyzed: de bas na mtshan bzung ba yin no//
translated: Therefore, the name is taken up.

original: de yang 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan no //
analyzed: de yang 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan no //
translated: Moreover, the name is called the Gathering.

original: de'i don ni sngar gtan la phab pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i don ni sngar gtan la phab pa nyid do //
translated: Its meaning has already been determined.

original: rgyu mtshan gang gi don du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gang gi don du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: For what reason?

original: 'dod chags kyi rigs can gyi sems can gyi sems gtsor byas nas de rnam par dag par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi rigs can gyi sems can gyi sems gtsor byas nas de rnam par dag par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, having made the mind of a sentient being of the passionate type the main thing, it purifies that.

original: byed pa po rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid la nyan pa pos gus pa nyid kyi phyir rab tu bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byed pa po rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid la nyan pa pos gus pa nyid kyi phyir rab tu bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The one who listens, having great respect for the agent, the Great Vajradhara himself, will be well established.

original: le'ur bcad pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i tshad do //
analyzed: le'ur bcad pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i tshad do //
translated: In the case of a chapter, etc., it is a measure.

original: de ltar na yongs su 'bad pa dang / gzhal bya mthar thug par gang du byas pa de ni le'ur bcad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na yongs su 'bad pa dang / gzhal bya mthar thug par gang du byas pa de ni le'ur bcad pa'o //
translated: Thus, that which is made to be the limit of the object of knowledge by thorough exertion is a chapter.

original: dum bu la sogs pa'ang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dum bu la sogs pa'ang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: A section, etc., should be understood in the same way.

original: gzhung dang zhes bya ba la yi ge dang don las @172b kyang shes par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhung dang zhes bya ba la yi ge dang don las @172b kyang shes par bya ste /
translated: In the case of a text, it should be understood from the letters and the meaning.

original: de gnyis ni 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis ni 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Those two are related.

original: dgos pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: dgos pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The purpose is twofold:

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: the stage of generation and the stage of completion.

original: de la dang po'i phyogs kyang rnam pa gnyis te 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de la dang po'i phyogs kyang rnam pa gnyis te 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
translated: The first of these has two parts: mundane and supramundane.

original: 'jig rten pa'i zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang dgug pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / gsad pa dang / dgar ba dang / mngon spyod la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang dgug pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / gsad pa dang / dgar ba dang / mngon spyod la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mundane are pacification, increase, subjugation, attraction, separation, killing, attraction, and destruction.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni grub pa rnam par brgyad de /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni grub pa rnam par brgyad de /
translated: The supramundane are the eight accomplishments.🔽They will be explained below.

original: de yang 'og nas bshad la ji ltar 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin pa grub pa dang // de bzhin du rin po che dang / padma dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / mdzub ris dang / mig sman dang / ri lu'i grub pa rnams so //
analyzed: de yang 'og nas bshad la ji ltar 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin pa grub pa dang // de bzhin du rin po che dang / padma dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / mdzub ris dang / mig sman dang / ri lu'i grub pa rnams so //
translated: The mundane accomplishments are those of the wheel, the jewel, the lotus, the vajra, the sword, the mark, the eye medicine, and the pill.

original: 'jig rten dag pa'i dgos pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dag pa'i dgos pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la'o //
translated: The purpose of the pure mundane is the completion stage.

original: sangs rgyas kyang ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid do //
translated: “Even buddhahood” is the state of Great Vajradhara.

original: gleng ba ni 'das so zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa'o //
analyzed: gleng ba ni 'das so zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa'o //
translated: “The discussion is finished” is the conclusion.

original: rigs pa gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: rigs pa gsungs pa ni /
translated: The reasoning is stated:

original: gnyis pa yang ni bshad par bya //
analyzed: gnyis pa yang ni bshad par bya //
translated: The second is also to be explained.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyud la sogs pa ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyud la sogs pa ni bstan pa'o //
translated: Here, the lineage, etc. are the teaching.

original: mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang mngon pa rnams kyi rigs pa sngar rab tu bstan nas /
analyzed: mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang mngon pa rnams kyi rigs pa sngar rab tu bstan nas /
translated: Having previously taught the reasoning of the Sutras, the Vinaya, and the Abhidharma,

original: phyis rang gi grub pa'i mthar ston to //
analyzed: phyis rang gi grub pa'i mthar ston to //
translated: later he teaches his own tenets.

original: mi yi skye bar 'khrungs pa ni //
analyzed: mi yi skye bar 'khrungs pa ni //
translated: He was born in the human race,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Here,

original: mi gdul bya yin pa'i phyir 'dra ba'i skye ba bzung ba ni rigs pa kho na'o ;
analyzed: mi gdul bya yin pa'i phyir 'dra ba'i skye ba bzung ba ni rigs pa kho na'o ;
translated: it is only reasonable that he took on a similar birth because he was a human disciple.

original: / mi'i skye ba bzung na yang 'dod chags dang bral ba la ma brten par ni sems can rnams 'dul bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: / mi'i skye ba bzung na yang 'dod chags dang bral ba la ma brten par ni sems can rnams 'dul bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Even though he took on a human birth, he would not have been able to tame sentient beings without being free from attachment.

original: de bas na de'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas byung ba ni gleng gzhi ste /
analyzed: de bas na de'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas byung ba ni gleng gzhi ste /
translated: Therefore, the reason for his leaving the harem is the nidana, the introduction.

original: gleng gzhi ni sngon byung ba'o //
analyzed: gleng gzhi ni sngon byung ba'o //
translated: The nidana is the prior occurrence.

original: gal te dgon pa la sogs pa na gnas na yang 'dod chags la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe khab nas byung ba don med pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te dgon pa la sogs pa na gnas na yang 'dod chags la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe khab nas byung ba don med pa yin na /
translated: If he were to live in the forest, etc., and attachment, etc. were to arise, then it would be pointless for him to leave the harem.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'dul ba'i sdom pa bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig ni bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'dul ba'i sdom pa bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig ni bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the etymology of the Vinaya is the conduct of the various bases of training.

original: 'bras bu bzhed pa yod pas /
analyzed: 'bras bu bzhed pa yod pas /
translated: The result is the desire to attain the five superknowledges.

original: bcom ldan 'das dka' ba spyod par mdzad pa de ni rgyu yin te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dka' ba spyod par mdzad pa de ni rgyu yin te /
translated: The cause is the Bhagavān’s practice of austerities,

original: 'bras bu thob par bya ba la thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu thob par bya ba la thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the method for attaining the result.

original: 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: This is the conclusion: “The Dharma of freedom from desire.”

original: 'dod chags kyi chos kyi rigs pa'i skabs ni sangs rgyas lnga zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi chos kyi rigs pa'i skabs ni sangs rgyas lnga zhes gsungs te /
translated: The context of the Dharma of desire is stated as “the five buddhas.”

original: nyon mongs pa lnga dang / rnam par shes pa lnga dang / phung po lnga dang / rlung lnga dang / 'byung ba chen po lnga @173a * //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa lnga dang / rnam par shes pa lnga dang / phung po lnga dang / rlung lnga dang / 'byung ba chen po lnga @173a * //
translated: The five afflictions, the five consciousnesses, the five aggregates, the five vāyus, and the five great elements

original: rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: are to be purified.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs kyi skur bzung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs kyi skur bzung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The Bhagavān Mahāvajradhara is held to be the kāya of the five families of the five tathāgatas.

original: 'di ni kun rdzob kyi phyogs su bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni kun rdzob kyi phyogs su bstan pa yin te /
translated: This is taught from the relative point of view.

original: de rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to reverse that,

original: rigs gcig tu yang 'gyur pa yin //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: rigs gcig tu yang 'gyur pa yin // zhes gsungs te /
translated: it is also of one type.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs kyi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs kyi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don no //
translated: This means that it is the essence of the family of Great Vajradhara.

original: 'di yan chad kyis ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di yan chad kyis ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
translated: Up to this point, it is the perfection of one's own welfare.

original: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa ni /
translated: The perfection of others' welfare is taught

original: rdo rje la sogs pa bzung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs pa bzung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: by holding the vajra and so forth.

original: sems can kyi khams mos pa sna tshogs pa yin pas de dag rjes su bzung ba'i phyir ni /
analyzed: sems can kyi khams mos pa sna tshogs pa yin pas de dag rjes su bzung ba'i phyir ni /
translated: Since the realm of sentient beings has various inclinations, in order to care for them,

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshon cha bsnams pa yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshon cha bsnams pa yin no //
translated: the Bhagavān holds the weapons such as the vajra.

original: de dag kyang ye shes la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo yin no zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i tshig gi don no //
analyzed: de dag kyang ye shes la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo yin no zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i tshig gi don no //
translated: Moreover, they are the essence of the purity of wisdom and so forth. This is the meaning of the etymological definition.

original: yang na dbang bskur ba'i dus su slob ma la rdo rje la sogs pa 'chang bar byed pa yin no ;
analyzed: yang na dbang bskur ba'i dus su slob ma la rdo rje la sogs pa 'chang bar byed pa yin no ;
translated: Alternatively, at the time of empowerment, the vajra and so forth are held for the disciple.

original: / der yang rnam par dag pa mngon du brjod nas sbyin par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: / der yang rnam par dag pa mngon du brjod nas sbyin par bya ba yin te /
translated: And there, too, it is to be given, after declaring the purity.🔽As it is said:

original: ji ltar / byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
analyzed: ji ltar / byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
translated: The Thought of Enlightenment is the vajra,

original: shes rab dril bu yin par shes //🔽zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: shes rab dril bu yin par shes // zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: and the bell is known as wisdom.

original: de bzhin du bcom ldan ni sgeg pa la sogs pa'i gar stabs dgu'i nyams kyi spyod pa mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du bcom ldan ni sgeg pa la sogs pa'i gar stabs dgu'i nyams kyi spyod pa mdzad pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the Lord performs the conduct of the nine moods of dance, such as the mood of grace.

original: gzhan dag la yang de ltar ston par mdzad de //
analyzed: gzhan dag la yang de ltar ston par mdzad de //
translated: And he teaches that to others.

original: de la sgeg pa'i nyams kyis spyod pa ni m'a ma k'i chen po dang lhan cig gtugs pa dang / 'khyud pa dang / sen mo dang sos gdab pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de la sgeg pa'i nyams kyis spyod pa ni m'a ma k'i chen po dang lhan cig gtugs pa dang / 'khyud pa dang / sen mo dang sos gdab pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Therein, the conduct of the mood of grace is the characteristic of embracing and kissing with Mahamaya.

original: dpa' bo'i spyod pa ni /
analyzed: dpa' bo'i spyod pa ni /
translated: The conduct of the hero is

original: ji ltar mtshan mo dur khrod kyi phyogs su ro slong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar mtshan mo dur khrod kyi phyogs su ro slong bar byed pa'o //
translated: as when he raises up corpses in the charnel grounds at night.🔽The conduct of the fierce one is

original: rngam pa'i spyod pa ni go ku da ha na za bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rngam pa'i spyod pa ni go ku da ha na za bar byed pa'o //
translated: when he eats cow-head.

original: smad pa dang 'jigs pa sbyin par byed pa ni rngam pa zhes bya bar bstan no //
analyzed: smad pa dang 'jigs pa sbyin par byed pa ni rngam pa zhes bya bar bstan no //
translated: It is taught that the fierce one gives contempt and fear.

original: dgod pa'i spyod pa ni ji ltar cung zad 'dzum pa nyid kyi sgom pa'am /
analyzed: dgod pa'i spyod pa ni ji ltar cung zad 'dzum pa nyid kyi sgom pa'am /
translated: The “laughing” practice is to meditate with a slight smile.

original: sgeg pa'i nyams kyi bye brag gam /
analyzed: sgeg pa'i nyams kyi bye brag gam /
translated: Or it is a particular expression of flirtation.

original: mtshan mo ro langs 'jigs par bya ba'i phyir gad mo chen po'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo ro langs 'jigs par bya ba'i phyir gad mo chen po'o //
translated: Or it is a great laugh to frighten the zombies at night.

original: drag po'i spyod pa ni ji ltar gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: drag po'i spyod pa ni ji ltar gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po bsgom pa'o //
translated: The “fierce” practice is to meditate on the fierce kings such as Yamântaka.

original: 'jigs su rung ba'i spyod pa ni de'i lus nyid kyis bgegs bskrad pa'o //
analyzed: 'jigs su rung ba'i spyod pa ni de'i lus nyid kyis bgegs bskrad pa'o //
translated: The “frightening” practice is to frighten away the obstructors with just one’s body.

original: snying rje'i spyod pa ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa nyid de /
analyzed: snying rje'i spyod pa ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa nyid de /
translated: The “compassionate” practice is naturally accomplished,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the Tathâgatas are endowed with great compassion.

original: rngam pa'i spyod pa ni ji ltar @173b 'jig rten dang 'gal bar gyur pa'i rim pas kyang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob pas so //
analyzed: rngam pa'i spyod pa ni ji ltar @173b 'jig rten dang 'gal bar gyur pa'i rim pas kyang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob pas so //
translated: The “angry” practice is to attain the state of Great Vajradhara by a process that is contrary to the world.

original: de yang le'u dgu pa'i skabs nas ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang le'u dgu pa'i skabs nas ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be taught in the ninth chapter.

original: zhi ba'i spyod pa ni rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
analyzed: zhi ba'i spyod pa ni rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
translated: The “peaceful” practice is non-conceptuality.

original: de yang 'bras bu'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de yang 'bras bu'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the essence of the result.

original: de ltar gnyis ni spyi'i rgyan yin te /
analyzed: de ltar gnyis ni spyi'i rgyan yin te /
translated: Thus, the first two are general ornaments,

original: bstan bcos mtha' dag gi don la khyab par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos mtha' dag gi don la khyab par byed pa'o //
translated: because they pervade the meaning of the entire treatise.

original: gnyis ni khyad par gyi rgyan yin no //
analyzed: gnyis ni khyad par gyi rgyan yin no //
translated: The next two are special ornaments.

original: de las dang po //
analyzed: de las dang po //
translated: Among them, the first is

original: rgyan ni gsum pa nyid kyang ni //
analyzed: rgyan ni gsum pa nyid kyang ni //
translated: the third ornament as well.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: Here, the text says

original: mtha' drug tshig gi nges zhes bya ba smos te /🔽mtha'i sgra ni bye brag gi rnam grangs so //
analyzed: mtha' drug tshig gi nges zhes bya ba smos te / mtha'i sgra ni bye brag gi rnam grangs so //
translated: the six parameters and four methods of interpretation.🔽The word “parameter” is a synonym for “distinction.”

original: de'i tshig gi nges pa zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa tsam ste /
analyzed: de'i tshig gi nges pa zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa tsam ste /
translated: The phrase “their verbal definitiveness” is merely an illustration,

original: don gyi nges pa yang ngo //
analyzed: don gyi nges pa yang ngo //
translated: because their meaning is also definitive.

original: de nyid kyi khyad par ni rnal 'byor rgyud kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi khyad par ni rnal 'byor rgyud kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin te /
translated: The difference between them is taught by the method of the Yoga Tantra,

original: bya ba'i rgyud dag la med pa'i phyir ro zhes bsams so //
analyzed: bya ba'i rgyud dag la med pa'i phyir ro zhes bsams so //
translated: because it does not exist in the Action Tantras.

original: gal te de lta na rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud gang la yang med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud gang la yang med do zhe na /
translated: If that is so, it does not exist in any of the Yoginī Tantras.

original: de skad du ma zer cig ces bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de skad du ma zer cig ces bya ba yin te /
translated: Do not say that!

original: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud ni khyad par du gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud ni khyad par du gyur pa yin te /
translated: The Yoginī Tantra is a special case.

original: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyang de'i nang du 'dus pa yin te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyang de'i nang du 'dus pa yin te /
translated: The Yoga Tantra is also included in that,🔽because it is also found in that.

original: de dag la yang yod pa yin pas skyon med do //
analyzed: de dag la yang yod pa yin pas skyon med do //
translated: There is no fault.

original: rgyas btab don ni rab rtogs bya //
analyzed: rgyas btab don ni rab rtogs bya //
translated: The meaning of the seal should be well understood.

original: zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud du /
translated: This is said in the Root Tantra:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i mdzod la rgyas btab pa bzhin du /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i mdzod la rgyas btab pa bzhin du /
translated: Just as the Blessed One sealed the royal treasury,

original: rdo rje'i tshig gi rgyas btab pa de la lde mig dang 'dra bar mtha' drug gi rim pa gang gi rab tu sad par byed pa yin no zhes bsams so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig gi rgyas btab pa de la lde mig dang 'dra bar mtha' drug gi rim pa gang gi rab tu sad par byed pa yin no zhes bsams so //
translated: the vajra words are sealed. That is opened by the key, the stages of the six parameters.

original: drang ba dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bstan pa'o //🔽skal ngan skyon ni sped pa la //
analyzed: drang ba dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bstan pa'o // skal ngan skyon ni sped pa la //
translated: The straight and so on are the teachings.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The protection of the faults of the unfortunate and so on.

original: de la sbed pa ni rtsod pa'i ngang tshul can nyid kyi phyir ro ;
analyzed: de la sbed pa ni rtsod pa'i ngang tshul can nyid kyi phyir ro ;
translated: There, protection is because of the nature of dispute.

original: ; skal ngan rnams la zhes bya ba ni mgu bar dka' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ; skal ngan rnams la zhes bya ba ni mgu bar dka' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The unfortunate is because of difficulty in pleasing.

original: de lta bu'i slob ma'i don du ni drang ba'i don du zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i slob ma'i don du ni drang ba'i don du zhes gsungs te /
translated: For the sake of such disciples, the interpretable meaning is taught.

original: drang ba ni rang bzhin gyi don las gzhan pa nyid du khrid pa yin te /
analyzed: drang ba ni rang bzhin gyi don las gzhan pa nyid du khrid pa yin te /
translated: Interpretable means that it leads to something other than the meaning of the nature of reality.

original: de bshad pa ni rgyal ba ste rdo rje 'chang gis so //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni rgyal ba ste rdo rje 'chang gis so //
translated: The explanation is by the Victor, by Vajradhara.

original: de dag la ni 'di tsam gyis don byed pa nyid kyis so ;
analyzed: de dag la ni 'di tsam gyis don byed pa nyid kyis so ;
translated: For them, it is just this that performs the function.

original: / don zhes bya ba ni don gyi rgyan nyid du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: / don zhes bya ba ni don gyi rgyan nyid du bstan pa yin no //
translated: The meaning is taught as the ornament of the meaning.

original: yang dag pa ni bden pa ste de kho na nyid ji lta ba'i don rab tu ston pa ste nges pa'i don ni gdon mi za ba'i don du yang gsungs pa yin la /
analyzed: yang dag pa ni bden pa ste de kho na nyid ji lta ba'i don rab tu ston pa ste nges pa'i don ni gdon mi za ba'i don du yang gsungs pa yin la /
translated: The true is the truth, the meaning of reality just as it is, which is taught as the definitive meaning, which is also said to be the undoubtedly meaningful.

original: sngar gsungs pa las gzhan zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: sngar gsungs pa las gzhan zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The other than what was previously taught is the remainder of the words.

original: 'di yang don gyi rgyan yin no //
analyzed: 'di yang don gyi rgyan yin no //
translated: This is also an ornament of the meaning.

original: mchog 'dod @174a * //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: mchog 'dod @174a * // ces bya ba la /
translated: For those who desire the supreme,

original: mchog ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rim pa yin te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rim pa yin te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: the supreme is the supramundane stage, which is the stage of completion.

original: de la 'dod pa ni gang la mngon par 'dod pa zhes bya ba de dag ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: de la 'dod pa ni gang la mngon par 'dod pa zhes bya ba de dag ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The desire is that which is called the one who desires.

original: de rnams la chos kyi de nyid ni tshig thams cad kyi don gyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams la chos kyi de nyid ni tshig thams cad kyi don gyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos nyid do //
translated: The reality of those is the reality of the nature of the meaning of all words.

original: gang rab tu ston pa de ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: gang rab tu ston pa de ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: The one who teaches that is Vajradhara.

original: mos pa sna tshogs pa'i 'khor gyi nang du brjod par mi rung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mos pa sna tshogs pa'i 'khor gyi nang du brjod par mi rung ba'i phyir /
translated: Because it is not suitable to be expressed in the midst of an assembly with various inclinations,🔽it is said to be the application of words that contradict reasoning.

original: rigs pa'i 'gal ba'i tshig gi sbyor ba yin zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'gal ba'i sgras so //
analyzed: rigs pa'i 'gal ba'i tshig gi sbyor ba yin zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'gal ba'i sgras so //
translated: That is, it is contradictory to the world.

original: yang na bum pa'i don bsgrub pa'i sgras byed pa la snam bu'i sgra sbyor ba 'dra bas so //
analyzed: yang na bum pa'i don bsgrub pa'i sgras byed pa la snam bu'i sgra sbyor ba 'dra bas so //
translated: Or, it is like the application of the word cloth to the function of establishing the meaning of a pot.

original: de ni dgongs pas bshad ces bya ba 'dis ni sgra'i rgyan yin no //
analyzed: de ni dgongs pas bshad ces bya ba 'dis ni sgra'i rgyan yin no //
translated: This is a verbal ornament, as it is said, It is explained with an intention.

original: dkyil 'khor sogs dang rtog pa la //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor sogs dang rtog pa la //
translated: In the maṇḍala and so on,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sgrub pa'i skabs la ni sgra ji bzhin pa de bzhin gyi don de dkyil 'khor khru bcu gnyis pa bya'o zhes bstan pa la ni de las nyung ba dang / lhag pa bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sgrub pa'i skabs la ni sgra ji bzhin pa de bzhin gyi don de dkyil 'khor khru bcu gnyis pa bya'o zhes bstan pa la ni de las nyung ba dang / lhag pa bya ba ma yin no //
translated: In the context of the ritual of the mandala, the meaning of the words is just as they are. The teaching that “the mandala should be twelve cubits” is not to be done with less or more than that.

original: de bzhin du cho ga dang rtog pa la yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du cho ga dang rtog pa la yang shes par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, it should be understood in the ritual and the treatise.

original: don rgyas zhes pa ni zab pa ma yin pa'i don bshad pa'i sgra gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: don rgyas zhes pa ni zab pa ma yin pa'i don bshad pa'i sgra gang yin pa'o //
translated: The meaning of “extensive” is the explanation of the meaning that is not profound.

original: de ni sgra ji bzhin gyi sgra'i rgyan nyid du gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni sgra ji bzhin gyi sgra'i rgyan nyid du gsungs pa'o //
translated: That is said to be the ornament of the words as they are.

original: ko t'a ksha la sogs pa'i sgra zhes pa la /
analyzed: ko t'a ksha la sogs pa'i sgra zhes pa la /
translated: The words “words such as koṭaka” and so on.

original: ji bzhin ma yin pa'i sgra bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ji bzhin ma yin pa'i sgra bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the words that are not literal is:🔽“Not in the treatises of the world.”

original: 'jig rten bstan bcos la med cing //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'jig rten bstan bcos la med cing // zhes bya ba la /
translated: In “not in the treatises of the world,”

original: sgra ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: sgra ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: the words are of two kinds:

original: 'jig rten pa dang bstan bcos pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang bstan bcos pa'o //
translated: those of the world and those of the treatises.

original: de la 'jig rten pa'i sgra ni ba lang dang / rta dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / phyugs dang / bya dang / glang po che dang / ri dags dang / bram ze la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'jig rten pa'i sgra ni ba lang dang / rta dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / phyugs dang / bya dang / glang po che dang / ri dags dang / bram ze la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mundane terms are cow, horse, man, woman, cattle, bird, elephant, deer, brahmin, and so on.

original: bstan bcos kyi sgra ni /
analyzed: bstan bcos kyi sgra ni /
translated: The terms of the treatises are:

original: de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang lam dang / stong pa nyid dpe /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang lam dang / stong pa nyid dpe /
translated: suchness, the limit of reality, nirvana, the path, emptiness,

original: dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa ni /
translated: the three jewels, and so on.

original: ko t'a ksha la sogs pa'i sgra ni 'jig rten pa dang bstan bcos kyi sgra ma yin te /
analyzed: ko t'a ksha la sogs pa'i sgra ni 'jig rten pa dang bstan bcos kyi sgra ma yin te /
translated: The terms kṣa, etc., are neither mundane nor of the treatises.

original: de ni don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they have no meaning.

original: gal te de lta na bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i phyir gsungs she na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i phyir gsungs she na /
translated: If that is so, why did the Bhagavat teach them?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: He taught them for the sake of the Tathāgatas, etc.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis rtog ge pa dang / sgra pa rnams kyi rtogs par dka' ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i mtshan 'di dag byas pa yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis rtog ge pa dang / sgra pa rnams kyi rtogs par dka' ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i mtshan 'di dag byas pa yin no //
translated: The Bhagavat has made these names of the five Tathagatas for the sake of the difficult to understand meaning of the logicians and grammarians.

original: yang na slob dpon 'phags pa lha'i zhal snga nas kyis spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron mar srog ces bya ba'i @174b rlung la sogs pa'i ming du gzhan 'di bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: yang na slob dpon 'phags pa lha'i zhal snga nas kyis spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron mar srog ces bya ba'i @174b rlung la sogs pa'i ming du gzhan 'di bzung ba yin no //
translated: Or, the master Āryadeva has taken up another name, the “life-force” wind, etc., in the Lamp of Condensed Practice.

original: 'di yang sgra'i rgyan yin no //
analyzed: 'di yang sgra'i rgyan yin no //
translated: This is also an ornament of words.

original: dbang po dman pa'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: dbang po dman pa'i sems can rnams //
translated: For sentient beings of inferior faculties,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: etc.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this.

original: dbang po dman pa ni re zhig nyan pa po'i dbang po'i khyad par thob pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po dman pa ni re zhig nyan pa po'i dbang po'i khyad par thob pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Those of inferior faculties have not yet attained the distinction of the faculties of the listener.

original: 'on kyang bla ma la gus shing bden pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa'i yul la gus pa dang bcas shing /
analyzed: 'on kyang bla ma la gus shing bden pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa'i yul la gus pa dang bcas shing /
translated: However, they are respectful to the guru and have respect for the objects such as the truth and the Three Jewels.

original: spyin pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i tshul can de kho na nyid kyi snod du rung ba de dag la /
analyzed: spyin pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i tshul can de kho na nyid kyi snod du rung ba de dag la /
translated: For those who are vessels of reality, who are endowed with the virtues of generosity and so forth,

original: mchog tu gsal ba bcom ldan 'das kyis de kho na nyid ston pa gang yin pa de ni dgongs pa ma yin pa'i rgyan yin no ;
analyzed: mchog tu gsal ba bcom ldan 'das kyis de kho na nyid ston pa gang yin pa de ni dgongs pa ma yin pa'i rgyan yin no ;
translated: the teaching of reality by the Bhagavat is the ornament of non-intentionalism.

original: / ci ste dgongs pa dang drang ba'i don du bshad pa la tha dad du bya ba ci yod ce na /
analyzed: / ci ste dgongs pa dang drang ba'i don du bshad pa la tha dad du bya ba ci yod ce na /
translated: If one asks, “What is the difference between intentional and non-literal explanations?”

original: sgra dang don gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa yin no zhes smras so //
analyzed: sgra dang don gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa yin no zhes smras so //
translated: It is said that they are different by the particularity of the words and their meanings.

original: dgongs pa dang ji bzhin ma yin pa'i sgras bshad pa la tha dad du bya ba ci yod ce na /
analyzed: dgongs pa dang ji bzhin ma yin pa'i sgras bshad pa la tha dad du bya ba ci yod ce na /
translated: If one asks, “What is the difference between intentional and non-literal explanations?”

original: 'gal ba dang grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra'i bye brag gis so //
analyzed: 'gal ba dang grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra'i bye brag gis so //
translated: It is by the particularity of the words that are contradictory and not well known.

original: dgongs pa dang ji bzhin pa'i sgra bshad pa la tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: dgongs pa dang ji bzhin pa'i sgra bshad pa la tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: If one asks, “What is the difference between intentional and literal explanations?”

original: 'gal ba dang 'gal ba ma yin pa'i bye brag gis so //
analyzed: 'gal ba dang 'gal ba ma yin pa'i bye brag gis so //
translated: It is by the particularity of the words that are contradictory and not contradictory.

original: nges pa'i don dang dgongs pa ma yin pa'i don la tha dad du bya ba ci yod ce na /
analyzed: nges pa'i don dang dgongs pa ma yin pa'i don la tha dad du bya ba ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the difference between the interpretable meaning and the definitive meaning?

original: dbang po rno ba dang / rtul pa'i bye brag gis so //
analyzed: dbang po rno ba dang / rtul pa'i bye brag gis so //
translated: It is due to the difference of the faculties of the disciples, whether they are sharp or dull.

original: de bzhin du dgongs pa dang / ji bzhin pa'i sgra dang / ji bzhin ma yin pa'i sgrar bshad pa gsum ni sgra'i rgyan no //
analyzed: de bzhin du dgongs pa dang / ji bzhin pa'i sgra dang / ji bzhin ma yin pa'i sgrar bshad pa gsum ni sgra'i rgyan no //
translated: Similarly, the three explanations of the interpretable meaning and the definitive meaning, and of the literal and non-literal, are the ornament of the words.

original: drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don dang / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa gsum ni don gyi rgyan yin no //
analyzed: drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don dang / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa gsum ni don gyi rgyan yin no //
translated: The three explanations of the interpretable meaning, the definitive meaning, and the indirect explanation are the ornament of the meanings.

original: bshad pa'i dbye ba bzhi bstan pa'i phyir tshig gi don zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa'i dbye ba bzhi bstan pa'i phyir tshig gi don zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bstan pa'o //
translated: In order to teach the fourfold division of explanation, the verse begins with the words, “the meaning of the words, etc. ”

original: dang po gcig pu kho na nyid //
analyzed: dang po gcig pu kho na nyid //
translated: The first is the single one alone.

original: ces bya ba la rab tu dbye ba sngon du 'gro bas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la rab tu dbye ba sngon du 'gro bas bshad pa'o //
translated: Here, the explanation is preceded by a division.

original: thams cad kyi spyi don gyi dbye ba ni rnam pa brgyad yin no //
analyzed: thams cad kyi spyi don gyi dbye ba ni rnam pa brgyad yin no //
translated: The general division of all the meanings is eightfold.

original: sgra tsam la ni rab gzhol ba'i //
analyzed: sgra tsam la ni rab gzhol ba'i //
translated: Those who are devoted to mere words,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: etc.

original: tshad ma dang brda sprod pa la mngon par zhugs pa rnams la ni rnam par dbye ba'i tshig dang / byed pa po dang / bsdu ba la sogs pa bshad pa tsam gyis dga' bar 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma dang brda sprod pa la mngon par zhugs pa rnams la ni rnam par dbye ba'i tshig dang / byed pa po dang / bsdu ba la sogs pa bshad pa tsam gyis dga' bar 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: For those who are engaged in logic and grammar, they are delighted by merely the explanation of the words of analysis, the agent, and the summary, and so on.

original: de bas na de'i don yi ge'i don zhes smos te /
analyzed: de bas na de'i don yi ge'i don zhes smos te /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of that is stated as the meaning of the syllables.

original: yi ge 'bru'i don gyis zhes pa sgra'i rgyan yin no //
analyzed: yi ge 'bru'i don gyis zhes pa sgra'i rgyan yin no //
translated: The meaning of the syllables is a verbal ornament.

original: mdo sogs la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshe mdo sde pa la sogs pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis sngags kyi lam la rab tu zhugs pa @175a * //
analyzed: mdo sogs la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshe mdo sde pa la sogs pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis sngags kyi lam la rab tu zhugs pa @175a * //
translated: When one enters the path of mantra through the power of a spiritual friend,

original: de'i tshe ; dam tshig dang spyod pa la sogs pa shin tu zab pa rnams mthong nas /
analyzed: de'i tshe ; dam tshig dang spyod pa la sogs pa shin tu zab pa rnams mthong nas /
translated: at that time, having seen the extremely profound commitments, conduct, and so on,

original: sems la 'gyod pa skyes te /
analyzed: sems la 'gyod pa skyes te /
translated: regret arises in the mind.

original: 'byer bar byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: 'byer bar byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: When that occurs,

original: dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sdig pa'i me la ji srid bye ba bzhin du ma ltung ba de'i bar du de dag skyob pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sdig pa'i me la ji srid bye ba bzhin du ma ltung ba de'i bar du de dag skyob pa'i phyir //
translated: in order to protect them from falling into the fire of the sin of abandoning the sublime dharma,🔽like a mother protects her child from falling into a fire pit,🔽the Bhagavān, the father of the world,

original: de dang rjes su mthun pa nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis ston par mdzad pa ni /
analyzed: de dang rjes su mthun pa nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis ston par mdzad pa ni /
translated: The Lord teaches in accordance with that.

original: de dag gang gi 'gyod pa las zlog par byed pa zhes bsams te /
analyzed: de dag gang gi 'gyod pa las zlog par byed pa zhes bsams te /
translated: One should think, Which of those causes regret?

original: dper brjod pa ni 'og nas mang du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper brjod pa ni 'og nas mang du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The examples will be explained in detail below.

original: de bzhin du bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba dbye ba gnyis pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba dbye ba gnyis pa yin te /
translated: Similarly, the stage of creation is the second division.

original: 'di ni don gyi rgyan yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni don gyi rgyan yin no //
translated: This is the ornament of the meaning.

original: sbas dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
analyzed: sbas dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
translated: The hidden, etc., are as follows:

original: sbas pa 'di la yod pas na sbas pa'o zhes rang nyid kyis smras so //
analyzed: sbas pa 'di la yod pas na sbas pa'o zhes rang nyid kyis smras so //
translated: The hidden is in this, therefore it is hidden, he says himself.

original: sbas pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: sbas pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the hidden?

original: 'dod chags chos ni rab ston pa //
analyzed: 'dod chags chos ni rab ston pa //
translated: The teaching of the Dharma of passion.

original: zhes bya ba 'dod chags rnam par dag pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dod chags rnam par dag pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is the teaching of the purity of passion.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,🔽the realization of conventional truth, etc.

original: kun rdzob bden pa rtogs pa dang // zhes bya ba 'dis ni rang bzhin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: kun rdzob bden pa rtogs pa dang // zhes bya ba 'dis ni rang bzhin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: This teaches the stage of natural perfection.

original: ye shes gsum po rnam pa brtags pa'i //
analyzed: ye shes gsum po rnam pa brtags pa'i //
translated: The three wisdoms are imagined.

original: zhes bya ba 'dis ni sems rnam par dag pa bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis ni sems rnam par dag pa bstan pa yin te /
translated: This shows the purification of mind.

original: 'di yang don gyi rgyan yin no //
analyzed: 'di yang don gyi rgyan yin no //
translated: This is also an ornament of the meaning.🔽The fourth stage is called radiant and fully entered.🔽The fifth stage is called difficult to conquer.🔽The sixth stage is called realization of presence.

original: 'od gsal ba dang rab tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa ste bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba dang rab tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa ste bzhi pa'o //
translated: The seventh stage is called far reaching.🔽The eighth stage is called immovable.🔽The ninth stage is called excellent wisdom.🔽The tenth stage is called cloud of Dharma.🔽The eleventh stage is called great joy.

original: zung du 'jug pa rtogs pa ste //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa rtogs pa ste //
translated: The twelfth stage is called summit of existence.🔽The thirteenth stage is called the stage of the vajra of the essence of the body of ultimate reality.🔽The fourteenth stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.

original: zhes bya bas ni rim pa lnga pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni rim pa lnga pa bstan pa'o //
translated: The fifteenth stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.

original: 'di yang don gyi rgyan yin no //🔽de la yi ge'i don gyis ni dgongs pa ma yin pa dang / sgra ji bzhin pa gnyis bsdus so //
analyzed: 'di yang don gyi rgyan yin no // de la yi ge'i don gyis ni dgongs pa ma yin pa dang / sgra ji bzhin pa gnyis bsdus so //
translated: The sixteenth stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.🔽The seventeenth stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.🔽The eighteenth stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.🔽The nineteenth stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.🔽The twentieth stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.🔽The twenty-first stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.

original: spyi'i don gyis ni drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don gnyis bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: spyi'i don gyis ni drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don gnyis bsdus pa yin no //
translated: The twenty-second stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.🔽The twenty-third stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.🔽The twenty-fourth stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.

original: sbas pa'i don gyis ni dgongs pas bshad pa bsdus pa yin no ;🔽/ mthar thug pa'i don gyis ni ji bzhin ma yin pa'i sgra bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: sbas pa'i don gyis ni dgongs pas bshad pa bsdus pa yin no ; / mthar thug pa'i don gyis ni ji bzhin ma yin pa'i sgra bsdus pa yin no //
translated: The twenty-fifth stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.🔽The twenty-sixth stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.🔽The twenty-seventh stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.🔽The twenty-eighth stage is called the stage of the vajra of the body of ultimate reality.

original: yi ge'i don dang spyi'i don gyis ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bsdus so //
analyzed: yi ge'i don dang spyi'i don gyis ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bsdus so //
translated: The twenty-ninth

original: sbas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig gis ni rdo rje bzlas pa bsdus so //
analyzed: sbas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig gis ni rdo rje bzlas pa bsdus so //
translated: One part of the hidden meaning includes the vajra repetition.

original: sbas pa'i don gyi phyogs gnyis pas ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa dang / rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bsdus so //
analyzed: sbas pa'i don gyi phyogs gnyis pas ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa dang / rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bsdus so //
translated: The other two parts of the hidden meaning include the stage of mind-purification and the stage of self-consecration.

original: mthar thug pa'i don gyis ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa dang / zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa bsdus te /
analyzed: mthar thug pa'i don gyis ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa dang / zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa bsdus te /
translated: The ultimate meaning includes the stage of manifest enlightenment and the stage of union.

original: 'di ni bsdus pa'i don yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni bsdus pa'i don yin te /
translated: This is the summarized meaning.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mthar thug pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mthar thug pa'i tshig go //
translated: Therefore, it is the ultimate word.

original: 'chad pas nyan par 'dod pa la //
analyzed: 'chad pas nyan par 'dod pa la //
translated: For those who desire to hear the explanation,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'chad pa po'i @175b rgyan bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'chad pa po'i @175b rgyan bstan pa yin te /
translated: Here, the explanation of the teacher is indicated.

original: nyan par zhes bya ba la nyan par byed pa'i bya ba la ltos nas byed pa po'i rkyen ni tsa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nyan par zhes bya ba la nyan par byed pa'i bya ba la ltos nas byed pa po'i rkyen ni tsa zhes bya'o //
translated: In to hear, the suffix -ta is used in the sense of the instrumental case, which indicates the agent in relation to the action of hearing.

original: gang dag nyan par byed pa de dag la ni rnam pa gnyis su bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: gang dag nyan par byed pa de dag la ni rnam pa gnyis su bshad par bya ste /
translated: For those who hear, the explanation is twofold.

original: gnyis po de bshad par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: gnyis po de bshad par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to explain those two, it is said:🔽The explanation of the teacher is twofold.

original: tshogs pa la bshad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan to //
analyzed: tshogs pa la bshad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan to //
translated: The explanation to the assembly is taught by to the assembly, etc.

original: tshogs ni 'khor gyi skye bo 'dus pa gsal ba'o //
analyzed: tshogs ni 'khor gyi skye bo 'dus pa gsal ba'o //
translated: The assembly is the gathering of the retinue.

original: de la bshad pa ni byed pa po'i rkyen l'u ta zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de la bshad pa ni byed pa po'i rkyen l'u ta zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The explanation is the causal condition of the agent, the word luṭ.

original: slob ma ni rjes su bstan pa ste /
analyzed: slob ma ni rjes su bstan pa ste /
translated: The disciple is the one to be taught.

original: dam tshig la sogs pa'i lam bstan pa ste /
analyzed: dam tshig la sogs pa'i lam bstan pa ste /
translated: The path is the path of the commitments, etc.

original: de dag ni gsang ba yin la /
analyzed: de dag ni gsang ba yin la /
translated: Those are the secret.

original: bla mas slob ma gang de dag la gang bshad pa de ni zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bla mas slob ma gang de dag la gang bshad pa de ni zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of what is explained to those disciples by the guru is that.

original: slob dpon gyis gang la brten nas bshad pa byed pa ste bstan pa ni //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis gang la brten nas bshad pa byed pa ste bstan pa ni //
translated: The teaching is what the master relies on in order to explain.

original: ji bzhin sgra dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: ji bzhin sgra dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of just as the sound, etc., is as follows.

original: dgongs pa ma yin pa dang / drang ba'i don gnyis ni don gyi rgyan yin no //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pa dang / drang ba'i don gnyis ni don gyi rgyan yin no //
translated: The two, the non-intentional and the interpretable meaning, are the meaning ornaments.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa ni sgra'i rgyan dang / de'i 'og tu yi ge'i don dang / spyi'i don yang bskyed pa'i rim pa gtsor byas pas tshogs pa la bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa ni sgra'i rgyan dang / de'i 'og tu yi ge'i don dang / spyi'i don yang bskyed pa'i rim pa gtsor byas pas tshogs pa la bshad pa yin te /
translated: The literal is the ornament of sound, and after that, the meaning of the syllables, and the general meaning are explained to the assembly, since the creation stage is primary.

original: de ltar rgyan rnam pa lnga ni bshad pa'i rim pa dang po yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rgyan rnam pa lnga ni bshad pa'i rim pa dang po yin no //
translated: Thus, the five ornaments are the first stage of explanation.

original: ji bzhin ma yin pa dang dgongs pas bshad pa ni sgra'i rgyan no //
analyzed: ji bzhin ma yin pa dang dgongs pas bshad pa ni sgra'i rgyan no //
translated: The non-literal and the intentional explanation are the ornament of sound.

original: nges pa'i don dang sbas pa dang mthar thug pa ni don gyi rgyan te /
analyzed: nges pa'i don dang sbas pa dang mthar thug pa ni don gyi rgyan te /
translated: The definitive meaning, the hidden, and the ultimate are the ornament of meaning,

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gtso bo yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gtso bo yin pa'i phyir /
translated: since the completion stage is primary.

original: slob ma la bshad par 'dod do //
analyzed: slob ma la bshad par 'dod do //
translated: It is desired to be explained to the disciple.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rim pa gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la smos te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rim pa gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la smos te /
translated: For that very reason, it is said two stages, and so on.

original: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
translated: Following the explanatory tantra,

original: zhes bya ba 'dis ni lung tshad mar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis ni lung tshad mar bstan pa yin no //
translated: this shows the validity of scripture.

original: 'jig rten nges par gyur pa yi //
analyzed: 'jig rten nges par gyur pa yi //
translated: The worldly one is the definite.

original: zhes bya ba 'dis ni nyan pa po'i rgyan bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis ni nyan pa po'i rgyan bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows the ornament of the listener.

original: sems can gyi khams mos pa sna tshogs yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams mos pa sna tshogs yod pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the realm of sentient beings has various inclinations,

original: rigs so sor nges par gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: rigs so sor nges par gyur pa yin te /
translated: the spiritual gene is determined in each case,

original: gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i rigs bzhin no //
analyzed: gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i rigs bzhin no //
translated: like the gene for gold, silver, etc.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la phyir mi rten zhe na /🔽rnam pa kun du nyan 'dod pa'i //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la phyir mi rten zhe na / rnam pa kun du nyan 'dod pa'i //
translated: If it is asked, “Is the spiritual gene of the bodhisattva not fixed?🔽”

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: it is said, “The one who is not interested in listening to the universal vehicle…”

original: nyan pa'i phyir zhugs pa la ni mi bshad pas rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nyan pa'i phyir zhugs pa la ni mi bshad pas rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not right to not explain the universal vehicle to one who is interested in listening to it.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: blo yi rnam pa du ma las //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: blo yi rnam pa du ma las // zhes bya ba la /
translated: “from the various aspects of the intellect…”
