original: blo rnam pa sna tshogs pa las so //
analyzed: blo rnam pa sna tshogs pa las so //
translated: means from the various kinds of intellects.

original: gang zag rnam pa lngar 'dod do //
analyzed: gang zag rnam pa lngar 'dod do //
translated: The five kinds of individuals are accepted,

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: but not other kinds.

original: autpala la sogs pa ni bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: autpala la sogs pa ni bstan pa yin no //
translated: The lotus and so on are taught.

original: thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba 'dis @176a * //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin // zhes bya ba 'dis @176a * //
translated: This is said by the Omniscient One.

original: ni lung tshad mar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: ni lung tshad mar bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows the validity of scripture.

original: de ni ma lus thos gyur la //
analyzed: de ni ma lus thos gyur la //
translated: “Having heard all of it…”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: gang zag autpala'i mtshan nyid ni slob dpon 'chad pa la nyan par zhugs pa na /🔽gzhal bya'i dngos po mtha' dag thos shing bzung la de las langs nas /
analyzed: gang zag autpala'i mtshan nyid ni slob dpon 'chad pa la nyan par zhugs pa na / gzhal bya'i dngos po mtha' dag thos shing bzung la de las langs nas /
translated: The person who is like a lotus is one who, when he begins to listen to the teacher's explanation,

original: rang gi gnas su phyin pa na thams cad brjed pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi gnas su phyin pa na thams cad brjed pa'o //
translated: hears and grasps all the things that are to be known, but when he rises from that and returns to his own dwelling, he forgets everything.

original: de nyid kyi phyir autpala dang 'dra bas autpala ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir autpala dang 'dra bas autpala ste /
translated: For that very reason, he is like a lotus, and so he is called a lotus.

original: autpala ni mtsho'i nang na yod na ni dri zhim zhing rnyed pa med la /
analyzed: autpala ni mtsho'i nang na yod na ni dri zhim zhing rnyed pa med la /
translated: When a lotus is in the water, it has a sweet fragrance but is not available.

original: de las phyung na ni dri med cing rnyed pa yin no //
analyzed: de las phyung na ni dri med cing rnyed pa yin no //
translated: When it is taken out of the water, it has no fragrance and is available.

original: gzung bya mang du'ang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni padma dkar po zhes bya ba'i gang zag bstan te /
analyzed: gzung bya mang du'ang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni padma dkar po zhes bya ba'i gang zag bstan te /
translated: The person who is like a white lotus is taught by the phrase, he grasps much, etc.

original: gzung bar bya ba ni chos kyi don no //
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba ni chos kyi don no //
translated: Grasp means the meaning of the Dharma.

original: lhag ma ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'o //
translated: The rest is a special quality in comparison with other practitioners of pure conduct.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: For that very reason, he is called 'one who grasps much.

original: mang ba ni mang po'o //
analyzed: mang ba ni mang po'o //
translated: Much means many.

original: thos par gyur kyang zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / bral bar gyur kyang ngo //
analyzed: thos par gyur kyang zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / bral bar gyur kyang ngo //
translated: Even if he hears it, even if he understands it, even if he retains it, even if he is free from doubt,

original: 'on kyang ston pa la 'jug pa na tshig gi phyogs gcig kyang rigs pas smra bar nus pa med de /
analyzed: 'on kyang ston pa la 'jug pa na tshig gi phyogs gcig kyang rigs pas smra bar nus pa med de /
translated: he is still unable to speak a single word of it when he is teaching, because he has no skill in teaching.

original: tshig la skyon yod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: tshig la skyon yod pa'i phyir te /
translated: He has a fault in his speech.

original: de ni padma dkar po zhes bya ba'i gang zag yin te /
analyzed: de ni padma dkar po zhes bya ba'i gang zag yin te /
translated: He is a person called a white-lotus person.

original: bum pa'i ras bal gyi sa bon dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: bum pa'i ras bal gyi sa bon dang 'dra ste /
translated: He is like a cotton seed in a pot.

original: bum par ras bal gyi sa bon bzhag na 'phel bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: bum par ras bal gyi sa bon bzhag na 'phel bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: If a cotton seed is placed in a pot, it will not grow.

original: de kho na bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro /
translated: It will remain just as it is.

original: // ras bal gyi sgra ni ras bal gyi sa bon la 'jug ste /
analyzed: // ras bal gyi sgra ni ras bal gyi sa bon la 'jug ste /
translated: The word “cotton” refers to a cotton seed.

original: bum pa'i nang nas 'bras bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bsams so //
analyzed: bum pa'i nang nas 'bras bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bsams so //
translated: It is thought that a fruit will not grow from a pot.

original: padma dkar po'i dri ni rang gi sbubs las gzhan du dri 'phro ba med pa de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: padma dkar po'i dri ni rang gi sbubs las gzhan du dri 'phro ba med pa de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The fragrance of a white lotus does not spread beyond its own womb.

original: dad dang ldan zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni padma zhes bya ba'i gang zag bstan te /
analyzed: dad dang ldan zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni padma zhes bya ba'i gang zag bstan te /
translated: The verse beginning with “endowed with faith” describes the person called “lotus.”

original: dper na rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i gnas ni sa yin no //
analyzed: dper na rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i gnas ni sa yin no //
translated: For example, the earth is the basis of the moving and unmoving.

original: de bzhin du yon tan mtha' dag gi tshogs kyi gzhi yang dad pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du yon tan mtha' dag gi tshogs kyi gzhi yang dad pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, faith is the basis of the collection of all good qualities.

original: de dang gang ldan pa ni dad pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de dang gang ldan pa ni dad pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: One who has that is “endowed with faith.”

original: shes pas ni yang dag par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: shes pas ni yang dag par rtogs pa'o //
translated: “Knowledge” means correct understanding.

original: de'i 'bras bu ni snying rje'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ni snying rje'o //
translated: Its result is compassion.

original: thos na blo'i kha bye ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: thos na blo'i kha bye ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: One who has that is called “endowed with knowledge and compassion.”

original: bla ma las chos dang / med sde dang rgyud dang gzhal bya rnam pa sna tshogs thos nas gtan tshigs dang dpe brjod pa'i tshul gyis rgya cher 'byed par nus pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma las chos dang / med sde dang rgyud dang gzhal bya rnam pa sna tshogs thos nas gtan tshigs dang dpe brjod pa'i tshul gyis rgya cher 'byed par nus pa'o //
translated: Having heard the Dharma from a teacher, and having heard various treatises, scriptures, and objects of knowledge, one is able to analyze them extensively by means of statements of reasons and examples.

original: tshigs med 'od ma ni sbubs stong pa'i bar du yin no //
analyzed: tshigs med 'od ma ni sbubs stong pa'i bar du yin no //
translated: Bamboo has hollow spaces inside.

original: 'od ma ni gling bu'o //
analyzed: 'od ma ni gling bu'o //
translated: Reed is a kind of grass.

original: de ji ltar gsal ba dang snyan par thos par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: de ji ltar gsal ba dang snyan par thos par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
translated: Just as one hears them clearly and pleasantly,

original: chos 'chad @176b pa'i dus su slob mas thos par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //🔽de nyid kyi phyir padma dang 'dra bas padma yin te /
analyzed: chos 'chad @176b pa'i dus su slob mas thos par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o // de nyid kyi phyir padma dang 'dra bas padma yin te /
translated: That is, the student hears the Dharma at the time of the teacher's exposition.🔽For this very reason, the student is like a lotus, and so is called lotus-like.

original: re zhig padma ni rang nyid kyang dri zhim pa yin la phyogs thams cad kyang de bzhin du dris khyab pa yin no zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi de lta bu'o //
analyzed: re zhig padma ni rang nyid kyang dri zhim pa yin la phyogs thams cad kyang de bzhin du dris khyab pa yin no zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi de lta bu'o //
translated: A lotus is fragrant by nature, and its fragrance pervades all directions.

original: thos pa nyung zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pas di tsandan zhes bya ba'i gang zag bstan te /
analyzed: thos pa nyung zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pas di tsandan zhes bya ba'i gang zag bstan te /
translated: The person who is like a stick of incense is indicated by having little learning, etc.

original: thos pa nyung ba ni chos mnag po 'dzin pa ma yin pa'o //🔽gal te brgya lam na slob dpon brtse ba'i dbang gis de bos te /
analyzed: thos pa nyung ba ni chos mnag po 'dzin pa ma yin pa'o // gal te brgya lam na slob dpon brtse ba'i dbang gis de bos te /
translated: Having little learning means not retaining the Dharma.🔽 If, by chance, the teacher, out of affection, calls him, Hey, you handsome one, cultivate learning,

original: kye bzhin bzang thos pa la goms par gyis shig dang / ji srid khyod kyi don du bshad pa la brtson par bya'o //🔽des de la smras pa ;
analyzed: kye bzhin bzang thos pa la goms par gyis shig dang / ji srid khyod kyi don du bshad pa la brtson par bya'o // des de la smras pa ;
translated: and I will strive to explain the Dharma for your sake,

original: thams cad kyang bdag gis shes pa yin te /
analyzed: thams cad kyang bdag gis shes pa yin te /
translated: he replies, I know everything!

original: de bas na bdag gi spyod yul du ma gyur pa ni gang yang med do zhes nga rgyal byed cing /
analyzed: de bas na bdag gi spyod yul du ma gyur pa ni gang yang med do zhes nga rgyal byed cing /
translated: Therefore, there is nothing that is not within my sphere of activity.

original: de spangs nas gzhan du 'gro bar byed do //
analyzed: de spangs nas gzhan du 'gro bar byed do //
translated: Having rejected that, he goes elsewhere.

original: rtsod pa'i dus su ni mang du smra la /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i dus su ni mang du smra la /
translated: In the age of dispute, he speaks much.

original: gal te rigs pa smra ba'i tshe ni skyon gang yang med na /
analyzed: gal te rigs pa smra ba'i tshe ni skyon gang yang med na /
translated: If he speaks rationally, he has no faults at all.

original: 'on kyang rtsa ba med pa ni mdo dang rigs pa'i lung spangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'on kyang rtsa ba med pa ni mdo dang rigs pa'i lung spangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: However, he is without a basis, which means that he rejects the scriptures of the sutras and reasoning.

original: de nyid kyis na rjes su bzung bar mi nus pa zhes smos te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na rjes su bzung bar mi nus pa zhes smos te /
translated: For that very reason, he is said to be incapable of being guided.

original: bla mas mkhas pa nyid du bsgrub par mi nus pa yin te /
analyzed: bla mas mkhas pa nyid du bsgrub par mi nus pa yin te /
translated: The guru is incapable of establishing him as learned.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: mi shes pa bde bar dga' bar nus //
analyzed: mi shes pa bde bar dga' bar nus //
translated: The ignorant can be pleased with happiness.

original: bye brag shes pa rab dgar nus //
analyzed: bye brag shes pa rab dgar nus //
translated: The discerning can be pleased with excellence.

original: shes rab cha tsam shes nyes pa //
analyzed: shes rab cha tsam shes nyes pa //
translated: But the one who is merely partial to wisdom

original: sangs rgyas kyis kyang dgar mi 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis kyang dgar mi 'gyur // zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: cannot be pleased even by the Buddha.

original: de ni tsandan dang 'dra bas tsandan zhes bya ba'i gang zag yin te /
analyzed: de ni tsandan dang 'dra bas tsandan zhes bya ba'i gang zag yin te /
translated: That person is like sandalwood, so he is called the “sandalwood person.”

original: tsandan ni 'bras bu med pa'i phyir dang / so gdug pa'i sprul gyis bskor ba'i phyir drung du 'ga' yang nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no //
analyzed: tsandan ni 'bras bu med pa'i phyir dang / so gdug pa'i sprul gyis bskor ba'i phyir drung du 'ga' yang nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no //
translated: Sandalwood is not approached by anyone because it has no fruit and is surrounded by poisonous snakes.

original: tshul khrims dag cing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rin chen zhes bya ba'i gang zag bstan te /
analyzed: tshul khrims dag cing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rin chen zhes bya ba'i gang zag bstan te /
translated: The one called Jewel is taught by the verse beginning with “pure morality.

original: tshul khrims ni brtul zhugs ma nyams pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims ni brtul zhugs ma nyams pa'o //
translated: Morality is the non-degeneration of vows.

original: dag pa ni bsam pa dag pa'o //
analyzed: dag pa ni bsam pa dag pa'o //
translated: Purity is the purity of intention.

original: mkha' la sgrin pa ni dag ba'i las la spro ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' la sgrin pa ni dag ba'i las la spro ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Skill in the sky is the enthusiasm for pure action.

original: shes rab dang ldan pa ni rnag bzhin gyis blo rno ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang ldan pa ni rnag bzhin gyis blo rno ba'o //
translated: Wisdom is the sharpness of the mind by nature.

original: dus gcig la zhes bya ba ni shes bya lan cig brjod pas ji skid 'tsho'i bar du bzung nas mi brjed pa ni dus gcig pa yin te /
analyzed: dus gcig la zhes bya ba ni shes bya lan cig brjod pas ji skid 'tsho'i bar du bzung nas mi brjed pa ni dus gcig pa yin te /
translated: At one time means that it is one time when, having grasped the object of knowledge by a single statement, it is not forgotten for as long as one lives.

original: chos nyid kyis thob pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos nyid kyis thob pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is endowed with the wisdom obtained by nature.

original: thos nas legs par ston pa ni //
analyzed: thos nas legs par ston pa ni //
translated: Having heard, it is well taught.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is said.

original: rang gi 'dod pas ma yin zhing lta ba gzhan gyis 'dres pa ma yin zhing zhes bya bas ni /
analyzed: rang gi 'dod pas ma yin zhing lta ba gzhan gyis 'dres pa ma yin zhing zhes bya bas ni /
translated: It is not mixed with other views,

original: yid ches pa'i lung nyid du ston @177a * //🔽pa yin no //
analyzed: yid ches pa'i lung nyid du ston @177a * // pa yin no //
translated: which shows that it is a trustworthy scripture.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rin po che bzhin du rin thang med pa'i rin po che yin pa'i phyir dang / re ba rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rin po che bzhin du rin thang med pa'i rin po che yin pa'i phyir dang / re ba rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is a jewel, because it is priceless like a jewel, and because it fulfills hopes.

original: yang na de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyi rin po che rnams gang la yod pa de ni /
analyzed: yang na de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyi rin po che rnams gang la yod pa de ni /
translated: Or else, it is a jewel because it is a collection of such good qualities.

original: rin po che zhes 'brum bu la sogs pa dang po na yod pa'i grangs la aa tsa'i rkyen byas te /🔽rin po che la sogs pa ni /🔽da bang po'i bye brag yin no //
analyzed: rin po che zhes 'brum bu la sogs pa dang po na yod pa'i grangs la aa tsa'i rkyen byas te / rin po che la sogs pa ni / da bang po'i bye brag yin no //
translated: The suffix -aka is added to the stem ratna, as in the words “jewel” and “gem,” to indicate the first case, the nominative.

original: de la tsandan ni bems  po'i rigs yin no //🔽autpala ni dbang po tha ma yin no //
analyzed: de la tsandan ni bems  po'i rigs yin no // autpala ni dbang po tha ma yin no //
translated: The suffix -ika is added to the stem ratna, as in the words “jewel” and “gem,” to indicate the sixth case, the genitive.🔽The suffix -ika is added to the stem ratna, as in the words “jewel” and “gem,” to indicate the seventh case, the dative.

original: padma dkar po ni 'bring po yin no //🔽padma ni rab yin no //
analyzed: padma dkar po ni 'bring po yin no // padma ni rab yin no //
translated: The suffix -ika is added to the stem ratna, as in the words “jewel” and “gem,” to indicate the eighth case, the ablative.🔽The suffix -ika is added to the stem ratna, as in the words “jewel” and “gem,” to indicate the fourth case, the genitive.

original: rin po che ni dbang po rab kyi yang rab yin no //
analyzed: rin po che ni dbang po rab kyi yang rab yin no //
translated: The suffix -ika is added to the stem ratna, as in the words “jewel” and “gem,” to indicate the fifth case, the locative.🔽The suffix -ika is added to the stem ratna, as in the words “jewel” and “gem,” to indicate the second case, the accusative.

original: de'i phyir gang zag bzhi po ni tshogs la bshad par rung ba yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang zag bzhi po ni tshogs la bshad par rung ba yin la /
translated: Therefore, the four persons are suitable to be explained in the assembly.

original: gcig ni slob ma la bshad pa'i snod yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa ni autpala de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig ni slob ma la bshad pa'i snod yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa ni autpala de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: In order to teach that one is a vessel for explaining to the disciple, it is said “the lotus, likewise,” and so forth.

original: rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pas ni //
translated: The wise vajra master🔽.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: de dag gi shes pa'i dbye ba yis zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de dag gi shes pa'i dbye ba yis zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: by the division of their knowledge.

original: gzhan dun thams cad nye bar 'dres par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan dun thams cad nye bar 'dres par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, all would be mixed up.

original: bstan bcos mtha' dag gi don bsdus pa'i rgyan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bstan bcos mtha' dag gi don bsdus pa'i rgyan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the ornament that summarizes the meaning of the entire treatise,

original: rgyan ni drug po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rgyan ni drug po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said “the six ornaments,” and so forth.

original: rgyan drug po mthar phyin na bstan bcos kyi lus kyi rim pa gnyis su phyin par 'gyur ro zhes bsams so //
analyzed: rgyan drug po mthar phyin na bstan bcos kyi lus kyi rim pa gnyis su phyin par 'gyur ro zhes bsams so //
translated: If the six ornaments are completed, the two stages of the body of the treatise are completed, it is thought.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /🔽de ni rgyan gyur bdun pa ste //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / de ni rgyan gyur bdun pa ste //
translated: For that very reason,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: it is said “that is the seventh ornament.”

original: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs na //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs na //
translated: Following the explanatory tantra,

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'dod pa 'gegs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'dod pa 'gegs pa yin no //
translated: This is the refutation of the opponent's position.

original: shin tu rnyed par dka' zhes bya bas ni 'grel pa byed pa gzhan gyis rnyed par dga' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu rnyed par dka' zhes bya bas ni 'grel pa byed pa gzhan gyis rnyed par dga' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase very difficult to find is for the delight of other commentators.

original: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud thams cad la yang 'di nyid kyi bshad par rigs kyi /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud thams cad la yang 'di nyid kyi bshad par rigs kyi /
translated: It is proper to explain all the Yoga Tantras with this very [commentary], and not with any other.

original: gzhan du ma yin no zhes bya ba'i sgra ji bzhin tsam gyis te /
analyzed: gzhan du ma yin no zhes bya ba'i sgra ji bzhin tsam gyis te /
translated: This is the literal meaning of the phrase just so.

original: 'dis ni rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba la sogs pas 'grel pa byas pa sun 'byin pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba la sogs pas 'grel pa byas pa sun 'byin pa yin no //
translated: This [commentary] refutes the commentaries of Ratnasaṃbhavaśānti and so forth.

original: rgyan 'di dag kyang glegs bam mthong ba tsam gyis shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyan 'di dag kyang glegs bam mthong ba tsam gyis shes pa ma yin te /
translated: These ornaments are not known just by seeing the book,

original: 'on kyang bla ma'i zhal la sogs pa las rnyed pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: 'on kyang bla ma'i zhal la sogs pa las rnyed pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ;
translated: but rather are obtained from the guru's mouth and so forth.

original: de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
analyzed: de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
translated: Therefore, the vajra master,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /🔽gleng gzhi ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te / gleng gzhi ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: and so forth is stated to show this.🔽The nidāna is the creation stage.

original: rim pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The stage is the completion stage.

original: de dag gi sbyor ba zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
analyzed: de dag gi sbyor ba zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
translated: The word application is supplied.🔽The word pure is the third ending.

original: dag ces bya ba ni byed pa'i gsum pa'o //
analyzed: dag ces bya ba ni byed pa'i gsum pa'o //
translated: The word skillful is the fourth ending.🔽The word in is the fifth ending.

original: bshad pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa yis //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa yis //
translated: The word explains is the sixth ending.🔽The word the is the seventh ending.🔽The word tantra is the eighth ending.🔽The word of is the ninth ending.🔽The word the is the tenth ending.🔽The word vajra is the eleventh ending.🔽The word master is the twelfth ending.

original: zhes bya ba @177b ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba @177b ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi khyad par ro //
translated: The word should is the thirteenth ending.

original: gzhan du na rgyan rnam par dbye ba yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na rgyan rnam par dbye ba yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word know is the fourteenth ending.🔽The word all is the fifteenth ending.🔽The word the is the sixteenth ending.🔽The word seven is the seventeenth ending.🔽The word ornaments is the eighteenth ending.🔽The word of is the nineteenth ending.🔽The word the is the twentieth ending.🔽The word vajra is the twenty-first ending.🔽The word master is the twenty-second ending.

original: 'o na rim pa'i sgra ni gnyi ga'i tshig yin na /🔽ji ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa la 'jug ce na /
analyzed: 'o na rim pa'i sgra ni gnyi ga'i tshig yin na / ji ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa la 'jug ce na /
translated: The word should is the twenty-third ending.🔽The word know is the twenty-fourth ending.🔽The word all is the twenty-fifth ending.

original: gleng gzhi'i sgra ni nye ba na yod pas so //🔽spyi'i sgra ni rig pa rnam pa gsum gyi khyad par la 'jug ste//
analyzed: gleng gzhi'i sgra ni nye ba na yod pas so // spyi'i sgra ni rig pa rnam pa gsum gyi khyad par la 'jug ste//
translated: The word the is the twenty-sixth ending.🔽The word seven is the twenty-seventh ending.🔽The word ornaments is the twenty-eighth ending.🔽The word of is the twenty-ninth ending.🔽The word the is the thirtieth ending.🔽The word vajra is the thirty-first ending.🔽The word master is the thirty-second ending.🔽The word should is the thirty-third ending.🔽The word know is the thirty-fourth ending.

original: don gyis dang / skabs dang sgra gzhan nye ba na yod pas so //🔽yang na ba glang la glang gi rigs pas nges pa med pa yang yin no //
analyzed: don gyis dang / skabs dang sgra gzhan nye ba na yod pas so // yang na ba glang la glang gi rigs pas nges pa med pa yang yin no //
translated: The word all is the thirty-fifth ending.🔽The word the is the thirty-sixth ending.🔽The word seven is the thirty-seventh ending.🔽The word ornaments is the thirty-eighth ending.🔽The word of is the thirty-ninth ending.

original: rgyan bdun bshad pa'i rigs pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni rgyan rnam pa bdun bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyan bdun bshad pa'i rigs pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni rgyan rnam pa bdun bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
translated: The word the is the fortieth ending.

original: da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bsdus pa'i don bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bsdus pa'i don bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the meaning of the summary is to be explained, beginning with “now.”

original: rjod pa dang brjod par bya ba'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngag 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: rjod pa dang brjod par bya ba'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngag 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this speech of Great Vajradhara, who is the nature of the expressed and the expresser, is as follows.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po spros pa med pa'i ngo bo sgra dang don gyi ngo bor gyur nas ston par mdzad pa de /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po spros pa med pa'i ngo bo sgra dang don gyi ngo bor gyur nas ston par mdzad pa de /
translated: Great Vajradhara, whose nature is free from conceptual elaborations, having become the nature of sound and meaning, teaches.

original: gzhan du na bye brag dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan du na bye brag dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Otherwise, because he would possess distinctions,

original: rdo rje nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: he would not be vajra.

original: sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor na spro ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor na spro ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: In the emanated maṇḍala, there is the maṇḍala of emanation.

original: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba ni rig pa'i padma'i nang du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba ni rig pa'i padma'i nang du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The empowerment of knowledge is the meaning of “within the lotus of knowledge.”

original: brtags pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: brtags pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With regard to the phrase “the stage of imagination and the stage of completion,”

original: brtags pa'i rim pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: brtags pa'i rim pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: the stage of imagination is the stage of creation.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o ;
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o ;
translated: The stage of completion is the stage of perfection.

original: / lha'i rnal 'byor gnyis pa ni yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: / lha'i rnal 'byor gnyis pa ni yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The second yoga of the deity is the yoga of the deity, which is both pure and impure.

original: le'u bcu drug pa'i don gzhan dag kyang rnyed pas zhes bya bas ni /
analyzed: le'u bcu drug pa'i don gzhan dag kyang rnyed pas zhes bya bas ni /
translated: And by obtaining other meanings of the sixteenth chapter means

original: der yang 'di nyid kyi don la lar gtan la phab pa yin no //
analyzed: der yang 'di nyid kyi don la lar gtan la phab pa yin no //
translated: that in some places the meaning of this [chapter] is determined,

original: thams cad du ni ma yin no //🔽gzhan du le'u bcu drug pa las ni /
analyzed: thams cad du ni ma yin no // gzhan du le'u bcu drug pa las ni /
translated: but not everywhere.

original: le'u bzhi pa las dkyil 'khor gsungs pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor spros te gsungs so zhes mi ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: le'u bzhi pa las dkyil 'khor gsungs pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor spros te gsungs so zhes mi ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the sixteenth chapter would not teach, The maṇḍala taught in the fourth chapter is elaborated and taught as the maṇḍala of colored powders.

original: de ltar re zhig lha'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis kyis rgod pa thob par 'gyur ba de bzlog pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig lha'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis kyis rgod pa thob par 'gyur ba de bzlog pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, first, in order to stop the agitation that occurs through the two types of deity yoga,

original: don dam pa'i bden pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir le'u gnyis pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir le'u gnyis pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: the second chapter is taught in order to engage with ultimate truth.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de la le'u gnyis pa las ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'ba' zhig nye bar ston pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de la le'u gnyis pa las ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'ba' zhig nye bar ston pa yin no //
translated: For that very reason, in that [second chapter], only the stage of completion is taught.

original: don dam pa la rab tu zhugs pa la ni gzhan gyi don med pas smon lam 'bras bu med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don dam pa la rab tu zhugs pa la ni gzhan gyi don med pas smon lam 'bras bu med pa'i phyir /
translated: Since there is no benefit for others in the one who has entered into the ultimate, the prayer is fruitless.

original: 'di nyid kyi nyes pa las bzlog pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi nyes pa las bzlog pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to avoid this fault,

original: le'u gsum pa las ni yongs su dag pa'i lha'i rnal @178a * //🔽'byor gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: le'u gsum pa las ni yongs su dag pa'i lha'i rnal @178a * // 'byor gsal bar byed do //
translated: in the third chapter, the yoga of the pure deity is clarified.

original: yongs su dag pa'i sgra ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: yongs su dag pa'i sgra ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The word “pure” is twofold:

original: gcig ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: gcig ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshig go //
translated: one is the word of the creation stage,

original: gnyis pa ni rang byin gyis brlab pa'i tshig ste 'di ni gnyi ga yang bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni rang byin gyis brlab pa'i tshig ste 'di ni gnyi ga yang bzung ba yin no //
translated: and the second is the word of the self-consecration.

original: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba thob nas /
analyzed: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba thob nas /
translated: Having obtained the initiation of knowledge,

original: le'u bzhi pa las ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: le'u bzhi pa las ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: in the fourth chapter, the irreversible initiation is given.

original: dbang bskur ba thob nas yang spyod pa byed de /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba thob nas yang spyod pa byed de /
translated: Having obtained the initiation, one engages in conduct.

original: de bas na spyod pa'i le'u lnga pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na spyod pa'i le'u lnga pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the fifth chapter is the conduct.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlab pa med par ni spyod pa mi 'grub pas /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlab pa med par ni spyod pa mi 'grub pas /
translated: Without the consecration of body, speech, and mind, conduct is not accomplished.

original: sku gsungs thugs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ni le'u drug pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsungs thugs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ni le'u drug pa'o //
translated: The blessing of the body, speech, and mind is the sixth chapter.

original: 'di ni mtshon pa tsam yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni mtshon pa tsam yin te /
translated: This is merely an illustration,

original: gzhan phra ba'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa yang gsungs te /
analyzed: gzhan phra ba'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa yang gsungs te /
translated: because other [teachings] such as the subtle yoga are also taught.

original: 'di'i rgyud yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di'i rgyud yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because this is its tantra.

original: le'u bdun pa la ni khyad par ci yang med de /
analyzed: le'u bdun pa la ni khyad par ci yang med de /
translated: The seventh chapter has no particular [difference],

original: 'on kyang le'u lnga pa las gsungs pa'i spros pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang le'u lnga pa las gsungs pa'i spros pa yin no //
translated: but it is an elaboration on what is taught in the fifth chapter.

original: rgya che ba'i don shes na /
analyzed: rgya che ba'i don shes na /
translated: If one understands the meaning of the extensive [version],

original: bde blag tu rtogs par bya'o zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: bde blag tu rtogs par bya'o zhes byas nas so //
translated: one should realize it easily.

original: de ltar byas kyang grub pa med na ji srid rang bzhin gyis rnam par rtog pa gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa nye bar ma zhi na /
analyzed: de ltar byas kyang grub pa med na ji srid rang bzhin gyis rnam par rtog pa gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa nye bar ma zhi na /
translated: Having done so, if there is no accomplishment, then as long as the natural concepts of pure and impure, etc., are not pacified,

original: de'i phyir gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba le'u brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba le'u brgyad pa'o //
translated: therefore, the secret empowerment is the eighth chapter.

original: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob na dus de nyid du grub par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob na dus de nyid du grub par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: If one obtains the secret empowerment, in order to accomplish it at that very time,

original: btsan thabs su ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir le'u dgu pa'o //
analyzed: btsan thabs su ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir le'u dgu pa'o //
translated: in order to accomplish the meditative concentration forcefully, [there is] the ninth chapter.

original: rnal 'byor pa sngags la mos pa rnams la ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob pa'i 'og tu sngags yang dag par bskul bas rdo rje 'chang chen po grub par bya ba'i phyir ni le'u bcu pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa sngags la mos pa rnams la ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob pa'i 'og tu sngags yang dag par bskul bas rdo rje 'chang chen po grub par bya ba'i phyir ni le'u bcu pa'o //
translated: For the yogis who are devoted to the mantra, after receiving the secret initiation, in order to attain the Great Vajradhara by the perfect invocation of the mantra, there is the tenth chapter.

original: de ltar dgu pa dang bcu pa ni brgyad pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar dgu pa dang bcu pa ni brgyad pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa yin no //
translated: Thus the ninth and tenth chapters are branches of the eighth.

original: gtsor byed pa dang gtsor mi byed pa'i slob ma'i bye brag gis so //
analyzed: gtsor byed pa dang gtsor mi byed pa'i slob ma'i bye brag gis so //
translated: This is because of the distinction of disciples who are principal and who are not principal.

original: gang yang btsan thabs kyi sbyor ba dang / snying pos yang dag par bskul bdag gis rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid thob pa de la ni bye brag rnam pa gnyis te /🔽sngags kyi sku dang ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa yin te /
analyzed: gang yang btsan thabs kyi sbyor ba dang / snying pos yang dag par bskul bdag gis rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid thob pa de la ni bye brag rnam pa gnyis te / sngags kyi sku dang ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa yin te /
translated: For those who attain the state of Great Vajradhara by the forceful method and the perfect invocation of the essence, there are two kinds of distinctions.🔽The mantra body and the gnosis body are generated.

original: de sngags kyi sku ni bskyed pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: de sngags kyi sku ni bskyed pa'i rim pas so //
translated: The mantra body is generated by the creation stage.

original: ye shes kyi sku ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin te /
analyzed: ye shes kyi sku ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin te /
translated: The gnosis body is the completion stage.

original: de'i don du le'u bcu gcig pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don du le'u bcu gcig pa'o //
translated: For that purpose, there is the eleventh chapter.

original: ye shes kyi sku la rab tu zhugs pas ni sems can gyi don yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ye shes kyi sku la rab tu zhugs pas ni sems can gyi don yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Since the body of gnosis is fully engaged, the welfare of sentient beings is not present.

original: de bas na de'i don du phyag rgya chen po yongs su gyur pas rang byin gyis brlab pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na de'i don du phyag rgya chen po yongs su gyur pas rang byin gyis brlab pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: Therefore, for that purpose, the twelfth chapter is the transformation of the great seal, the chapter of self-consecration.

original: skyes pa'i rnam pa las sems can rjes @178b su bzung ba yin te /
analyzed: skyes pa'i rnam pa las sems can rjes @178b su bzung ba yin te /
translated: Since the welfare of sentient beings is taken up from the aspect of the born,

original: des kyang las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: des kyang las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: one accomplishes the various applications of activity.

original: de'i phyir le'u bcu gsum pa dang bcu bzhi pa dag ni las kyi sbyor ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir le'u bcu gsum pa dang bcu bzhi pa dag ni las kyi sbyor ba'i don du'o //
translated: Therefore, the thirteenth and fourteenth chapters are for the purpose of the application of activity.

original: gal te las kyi sbyor ba'i sgo nas rig pa la mngon par zhen par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te las kyi sbyor ba'i sgo nas rig pa la mngon par zhen par 'gyur te /
translated: If one becomes attached to the knowledge through the door of the application of activity,

original: de bas na de spang bar bya ba'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du bya ba'i phyir ni le'u bco lnga pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na de spang bar bya ba'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du bya ba'i phyir ni le'u bco lnga pa'o //
translated: then, in order to abandon that and actualize the samādhi of illusion-like [reality], there is the fifteenth chapter.

original: le'u bcu drug pa ni le'u bzhi pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: le'u bcu drug pa ni le'u bzhi pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa yin no //
translated: The sixteenth chapter is a branch of the fourth chapter.

original: 'di ni mtshon pa tsam yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni mtshon pa tsam yin te /
translated: This is merely an illustration.

original: le'u thams cad kyi yan lag tu gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: le'u thams cad kyi yan lag tu gyur pa yin no //
translated: It is an auxiliary to all the chapters.

original: de nyid kyi phyir phyi nas gsungs pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don du grub pa dam tshig dang sdom pa'i sgo nas yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir phyi nas gsungs pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don du grub pa dam tshig dang sdom pa'i sgo nas yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is stated later on, for the sake of accomplishing the aims of self and other, by way of the commitments and vows.

original: de bas na de'i phyir le'u bcu bdun pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na de'i phyir le'u bcu bdun pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the seventeenth chapter.

original: 'di las gzhan pa'i bya ba med pas le'u gzhan med do //
analyzed: 'di las gzhan pa'i bya ba med pas le'u gzhan med do //
translated: Since there is no other activity apart from this, there is no other chapter.

original: 'o na le'u bco brgyad po ni yod pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na le'u bco brgyad po ni yod pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But if there are eighteen chapters,

original: de ni bden mod kyi de spyi'i 'grel pa dang 'dra bas nyes pa med do //
analyzed: de ni bden mod kyi de spyi'i 'grel pa dang 'dra bas nyes pa med do //
translated: that is true, but since it is like a general commentary, there is no fault.

original: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa le'u bcu bdun gyi bshad pa'i bye brag ston pa shin tu rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa le'u bcu bdun gyi bshad pa'i bye brag ston pa shin tu rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The explanation of the distinctions of the seventeen chapters beginning with that is very easy to understand.

original: 'di dag gi don tshad mar bya ba'i phyir mdo'i tshig bshad pa'i rgyud las bstan te /
analyzed: 'di dag gi don tshad mar bya ba'i phyir mdo'i tshig bshad pa'i rgyud las bstan te /
translated: In order to make the meaning of these [chapters] authoritative, the Tantra of the Explanation of the Intention is taught.

original: dgongs pa dang dgongs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: dgongs pa dang dgongs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: It is stated, intention, non-intention, and so on.

original: 'o na rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi mtha' rnam pa drug tu nges pa yin no zhes bya bar ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'o na rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi mtha' rnam pa drug tu nges pa yin no zhes bya bar ni mi rigs te /
translated: Well, then, it is not correct to say that the Yoga Tantra is defined as having six limits.

original: 'di ni rgyan rnam pa bdun yin no zhes brjod par bya ba kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ni rgyan rnam pa bdun yin no zhes brjod par bya ba kho na'o zhe na /
translated: It should be said that it has seven ornaments.

original: 'di ni skyon med de /
analyzed: 'di ni skyon med de /
translated: There is no fault here.

original: re zhig gleng bslang ba dang rigs pa ni bstan bcos mtha' dag la khyab pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: re zhig gleng bslang ba dang rigs pa ni bstan bcos mtha' dag la khyab pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The introduction and the reasoning pervade the entire treatise.

original: tshigs bcad re re la ni rnam par dbye ba ma yin te /
analyzed: tshigs bcad re re la ni rnam par dbye ba ma yin te /
translated: They are not divisions of each verse.

original: ba glang la glang nyid ces so so'i sgrar brjod pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: ba glang la glang nyid ces so so'i sgrar brjod pa ni ma yin la /
translated: It is not like the individual expression “oxness” for an ox.

original: glang gi tshogs mtha' dag la glang nyid ces bya ba gcig gis kyang khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: glang gi tshogs mtha' dag la glang nyid ces bya ba gcig gis kyang khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The entire collection of oxen is pervaded by the single term “oxness.”

original: smra ba'i rgyan ni so sor brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: smra ba'i rgyan ni so sor brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The ornament of speech is not to be expressed individually.

original: ji srid smra ba po med pa de srid du sgra dang don bsgrub par mi nus te /
analyzed: ji srid smra ba po med pa de srid du sgra dang don bsgrub par mi nus te /
translated: As long as there is no speaker, the establishment of the sound and meaning is not possible.

original: de bas na shugs kyis smra ba po'i rgyan grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na shugs kyis smra ba po'i rgyan grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the ornament of the speaker is established by implication.

original: de yang gzhi med par ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang gzhi med par ni ma yin te /
translated: And it is not without a basis,

original: mtha' drug la de brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' drug la de brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the six parameters are based on it.

original: mtha' drug la de brten nas bshad pa rnam pa gnyis smra ba po byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mtha' drug la de brten nas bshad pa rnam pa gnyis smra ba po byed pa yin no //
translated: The two kinds of statements are made by the speaker based on the six parameters.

original: bshad pa zhes bya ba'i las ni byed pa po la gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa zhes bya ba'i las ni byed pa po la gnas pa yin no //
translated: The action called “statement” is based on the speaker.

original: nyan pa po'i rgyan yang tha dad par yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nyan pa po'i rgyan yang tha dad par yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The ornament of the listener is not separate.

original: gal te tha dad par brjod na ni smra ba po don med pa yin te de yang @179a * //
analyzed: gal te tha dad par brjod na ni smra ba po don med pa yin te de yang @179a * //
translated: If it were separate, the speaker would be pointless, because

original: nyan pa po la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyan pa po la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that is also based on the listener.

original: bsdus pa'i rgyan yang bstan bcos mtha' dag la khyab par byed pa kho nas /
analyzed: bsdus pa'i rgyan yang bstan bcos mtha' dag la khyab par byed pa kho nas /
translated: The ornament of the summary is only pervasive in the entire treatise.

original: gleng bslang ba sngar bstan pa dang 'dra ba nyid do //
analyzed: gleng bslang ba sngar bstan pa dang 'dra ba nyid do //
translated: The introduction is just as previously explained.

original: de'i lhag ma mtha' drug dang bshad pa dag ni tshigs bcad re re la brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i lhag ma mtha' drug dang bshad pa dag ni tshigs bcad re re la brjod par bya'o //
translated: The remaining six parameters and explanations should be stated for each verse.

original: gal te de lta na mtha' drug ces bya ba'i 'grel pa'i ming ci'i phyir rab tu grags /
analyzed: gal te de lta na mtha' drug ces bya ba'i 'grel pa'i ming ci'i phyir rab tu grags /
translated: If that is so, why is the name “Commentary on the Six Parameters” well known?

original: mtha' drug dang bshad pa zhes bya bar rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: mtha' drug dang bshad pa zhes bya bar rigs so zhe na /
translated: If you say, It is reasonable to call it the six limits and the explanation,

original: de ni nyes pa med do //
analyzed: de ni nyes pa med do //
translated: that is not a fault.

original: gnyi gas kyang ming thob par gyur pa de ni gzhan dang gzhan dag la yang tha snyad chags te /
analyzed: gnyi gas kyang ming thob par gyur pa de ni gzhan dang gzhan dag la yang tha snyad chags te /
translated: Both of them obtain the name, and that is conventionally attached to others as well.

original: dper na ma'i bu pha'i bu zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na ma'i bu pha'i bu zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the son of the mother and the son of the father.

original: gsang ba'i bdag po don rgyas pa'i zhes bya ba nas 'di ni bsdus pa'i don bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po don rgyas pa'i zhes bya ba nas 'di ni bsdus pa'i don bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: The one who is called the lord of secrets up to this is the teaching of the condensed meaning

original: mtha' drug mi shes pa smad par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: mtha' drug mi shes pa smad par bstan pa yin no //
translated: teaches the condemnation of not knowing the six limits.

original: de rjes su gzung ba'i phyir 'brel pa brtsams pa yin no //
analyzed: de rjes su gzung ba'i phyir 'brel pa brtsams pa yin no //
translated: For the sake of guiding them, the connection is begun.

original: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang po'i tshig gis ni brtags pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor ni yi ge'i don gyi phyogs su bstan to //
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang po'i tshig gis ni brtags pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor ni yi ge'i don gyi phyogs su bstan to //
translated: The words thus have I heard and so on at the beginning teach the yoga of the imagined deity from the perspective of the meaning of the syllables.

original: spyi'i don gyi phyogs ni phyogs snga ma sel ba'i sgo nas skabs ston par byed do //
analyzed: spyi'i don gyi phyogs ni phyogs snga ma sel ba'i sgo nas skabs ston par byed do //
translated: The general meaning from the perspective of the previous position teaches the occasion by way of elimination.

original: dgongs pa gang gis sdud par byed pa zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: dgongs pa gang gis sdud par byed pa zhes bya ba nas /
translated: By what intention does it gather?

original: mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis so //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis so //
translated: up to: it shows nirvana.

original: 'di skad ces bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyis ni shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid yin no zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: 'di skad ces bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyis ni shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid yin no zhes bya ba nas /
translated: By the two syllables “evam” it is said that it has the nature of wisdom and means,

original: thig le'i gzugs kyis gnas pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'gro ba thams cad skye ba'i sgo nas bsdus pa'i don yin no //🔽chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang / bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kyi //🔽kun gyi gzhi dang pha ma ni //
analyzed: thig le'i gzugs kyis gnas pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'gro ba thams cad skye ba'i sgo nas bsdus pa'i don yin no // chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang / bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kyi // kun gyi gzhi dang pha ma ni //
translated: up to: it abides in the form of a drop.🔽The two syllables are taught as the basis and the mother of all the Dharma aggregates,

original: yi ge gnyis su de bzhin bstan //
analyzed: yi ge gnyis su de bzhin bstan //
translated: of the enumeration of 84,000.🔽The syllable “va” is the father,🔽and the syllable “e” is the mother.

original: zhes bya bas ni mdo sde la sogs pa'i nyes pa sel ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni mdo sde la sogs pa'i nyes pa sel ba yin no //
translated: Thus, it removes the faults of the sutras, etc.

original: yi ge ae ni mar gyur la //🔽zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bsnyen pa bstan to //
analyzed: yi ge ae ni mar gyur la // zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bsnyen pa bstan to //
translated: The syllable “e” is the mother,🔽and the syllable “va” is the father.

original: ae ni padma zhes bshad la //
analyzed: ae ni padma zhes bshad la //
translated: The syllable “e” is explained as the lotus,🔽and the syllable “va” is explained as the vajra.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis ni nye ba'i bsnyan  pa bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis ni nye ba'i bsnyan  pa bstan to //
translated: One verse is taught by the word “etc.”

original: ae ni shes rab nyid gyur la //
analyzed: ae ni shes rab nyid gyur la //
translated: The letter E is the perfection of wisdom.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis ni sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis ni sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po bstan to //
translated: One verse is taught by the word “etc.”

original: cha gnyis pa ni yi ge aa'o //
analyzed: cha gnyis pa ni yi ge aa'o //
translated: The second part is the letter A.

original: dgu pa ni yi ge aom yin no //
analyzed: dgu pa ni yi ge aom yin no //
translated: The ninth is the letter OM.

original: sum cu bcu dang lnga pa'i sa bon ni yi ge ha yin no //
analyzed: sum cu bcu dang lnga pa'i sa bon ni yi ge ha yin no //
translated: The seed of the thirty-first is the letter H.

original: cha gnyis pa ni tshig drag go //
analyzed: cha gnyis pa ni tshig drag go //
translated: The second part is the emphatic particle.

original: lnga pa ni yi ge ma'o //
analyzed: lnga pa ni yi ge ma'o //
translated: The fifth is the letter M.

original: @179b de nyid kla dkar ro //
analyzed: @179b de nyid kla dkar ro //
translated: That itself is the inverted letter K.

original: drug pa ni yi ge au yin no //
analyzed: drug pa ni yi ge au yin no //
translated: The sixth is the letter U.

original: theg le ni klad dkor ro //
analyzed: theg le ni klad dkor ro //
translated: The bindu is the head ornament.

original: de ltar aom a'a:h'um yin no //
analyzed: de ltar aom a'a:h'um yin no //
translated: Thus, it is OM AH HUM.

original: yi ge gsum 'byung bas zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: yi ge gsum 'byung bas zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The three letters are produced, and they enter, one should say.

original: kha cig gcig ni cha gnyis ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa mtshams sbyar gyi yi ge aa dgag pa'i tshig tu byas nas /
analyzed: kha cig gcig ni cha gnyis ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa mtshams sbyar gyi yi ge aa dgag pa'i tshig tu byas nas /
translated: Some say that the letter A is not a part, and so on, and they take the letter A as a negative particle,

original: thig le tsam yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: thig le tsam yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: and they say that it is just a bindu.

original: sbas pa'i bshad pa ni rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: sbas pa'i bshad pa ni rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa yin te /
translated: The hidden explanation is the explanation of the Vajra Garland Tantra.

original: de yang tshigs bcad du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang tshigs bcad du shes par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, it should be understood in verse.

original: ae ni shes rab dam pa nyid //
analyzed: ae ni shes rab dam pa nyid //
translated: E is the nature of sublime wisdom.

original: ces bya ba nas /
analyzed: ces bya ba nas /
translated: Up to:

original: rnam shes nyid ni lnga pa'o //
analyzed: rnam shes nyid ni lnga pa'o //
translated: Consciousness itself is the fifth.

original: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: By this,

original: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa yin no //
analyzed: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa yin no //
translated: the stage of the purification of mind is taught.

original: ye shes gsum rnam par 'byed pa ni gcig tu sbas pa'i don no //
analyzed: ye shes gsum rnam par 'byed pa ni gcig tu sbas pa'i don no //
translated: The differentiation of the three wisdoms is the single hidden meaning.🔽Equality, discernment,

original: mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang // zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang // zhes bya ba nas /
translated: up to:

original: de dang der rigs las 'byung ba //
analyzed: de dang der rigs las 'byung ba //
translated: Arising from the various families,

original: lha dang lha mo tha dad pa //
analyzed: lha dang lha mo tha dad pa //
translated: the different gods and goddesses

original: de ni yod min de med kyang //
analyzed: de ni yod min de med kyang //
translated: do not exist, and yet they are taught

original: 'gro ba'i don phyir ston pa yin //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don phyir ston pa yin //
translated: for the sake of the world.

original: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: By this,

original: lha'i sku rnam par dag pa sngon du 'gro ba'i rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: lha'i sku rnam par dag pa sngon du 'gro ba'i rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: the stage of vajra repetition is taught, preceded by the purification of the deity's form.

original: de'i nang nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab cing zhes bya bas ni sangs rgyas spyan ma la sogs pa'am dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa'am /
analyzed: de'i nang nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab cing zhes bya bas ni sangs rgyas spyan ma la sogs pa'am dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa'am /
translated: Among them, sealing with the four seals means with Buddhalocanā, etc. , or with summoning, inducting, etc. ,

original: las kyi phyag rgyal sogs pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgyal sogs pa'o //
translated: or with the karmamudrā, etc. .

original: de nyid 'dod chags kyi chos ston pa'i sbas pa'i don gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'dod chags kyi chos ston pa'i sbas pa'i don gnyis pa'o //
translated: That is the second hidden meaning, the teaching of the Dharma of passion.

original: 'di las gnyis med mthong ba yi //
analyzed: 'di las gnyis med mthong ba yi //
translated: From Seeing nonduality in this

original: zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas /
translated: up to

original: sbas pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa ste /
analyzed: sbas pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa ste /
translated: hidden teaches the illusionlike samādhi.

original: de kho na rnag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na rnag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the stage of the consecration of the reality.

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa la de ma thag mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa ni sbas pa'i don gsum pa'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa la de ma thag mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa ni sbas pa'i don gsum pa'o //
translated: The stage of the immediately manifest enlightenment in the conventional truth is the third hidden meaning.

original: yang lung gi bshad pa gsungs pa ni zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: yang lung gi bshad pa gsungs pa ni zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The statement of the explanation of the scripture is from Moreover🔽up to

original: gnas med gnas pa'o zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: gnas med gnas pa'o zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa mthar thug pa'o //
translated: abiding without abiding is called hidden.  This is the ultimate stage of union.

original: don gcig go //
analyzed: don gcig go //
translated: It has the same meaning.

original: nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'di la ni //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'di la ni //
translated: In this nature of space,

original: zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas /
translated: up to:

original: thub pa chen po bzhugs par mdzad //
analyzed: thub pa chen po bzhugs par mdzad //
translated: the Great Sage abides.

original: ces bya ba'i bar gyis ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa bstan te /
analyzed: ces bya ba'i bar gyis ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa bstan te /
translated: This teaches the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: de nyid 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa ste mthar thug pa gnyis pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: de nyid 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa ste mthar thug pa gnyis pa'i don yin no //
translated: That is the entry into clear light, the meaning of the second ultimate.

original: de ltar dang po'i ngag gi yi ge'i don dang spyi'i don gyi yan lag bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa yin no //🔽sba ba dang mthar thug pa dag gis ni rim pa lnga'i bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar dang po'i ngag gi yi ge'i don dang spyi'i don gyi yan lag bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa yin no // sba ba dang mthar thug pa dag gis ni rim pa lnga'i bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: Thus the first verse teaches the creation stage, which is the branch of the meaning of the words and the general meaning.
The hidden and the ultimate teach the perfection stage, which has the nature of the five stages.

original: bas na dang po'i ngag ni bstan bcos mtha' dag gi lus yin na //
analyzed: bas na dang po'i ngag ni bstan bcos mtha' dag gi lus yin na //
translated: Therefore the first verse is the body of the entire treatise.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: de ltar bzhugs pa'i tshig nyid kyi rgyud ma lus pa'i dgongs pa bstan nas zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar bzhugs pa'i tshig nyid kyi rgyud ma lus pa'i dgongs pa bstan nas zhes gsungs so //
translated: it is said, “Having taught the thought of the entire tantra by just those words of the abode, . . .”

original: de'i 'og tu brjod kyis mi lang pa'i zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu brjod kyis mi lang pa'i zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Then, “inexpressible . . .

original: gzhal med khang gi dbus su bzhugs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhal med khang gi dbus su bzhugs pa ste /
translated: abides in the middle of the celestial mansion.

original: nges pa'i don zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
analyzed: nges pa'i don zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
translated: The phrase with the definitive meaning indicates the excellence of the retinue.

original: der ni drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyi rgyan bstan to //
analyzed: der ni drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyi rgyan bstan to //
translated: Here, the ornament of the interpretable meaning and the ornament of the definitive meaning are taught.

original: de ltar ston pa dang gnas dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas snga ma bzhin te nges pa'i don te zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pa bstan to//
analyzed: de ltar ston pa dang gnas dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas snga ma bzhin te nges pa'i don te zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pa bstan to//
translated: Thus, the phrase the teacher, the place, and so on, as before, up to the definitive meaning indicates the process of expansion and contraction.🔽Now, the verse-text begins:

original: da ni 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa'i //
analyzed: da ni 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa'i //
translated: In the desire realm,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i khams bstan bcos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin kyang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i khams bstan bcos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin kyang /
translated: After the Bhagavat Buddha passed away, although the desire realm was the farthest limit of all treatises,

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba med de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba med de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: there was no freedom from attachment. Why is that?

original: 'dod pa'i khams ni de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams ni de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the desire realm has such characteristics.

original: des na de dag gi 'dod chags kyi spang ba'i phyir lha'i rnam par spros pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de dag gi 'dod chags kyi spang ba'i phyir lha'i rnam par spros pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, in order to eliminate their attachment, the emanations of the gods were taught.

original: de ltar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug tu bstan nas zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de ltar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug tu bstan nas zhes pa nas /
translated: Having thus taught the Lord of Desire by emanating the dhāraṇī maṇḍala,

original: rdo rje'i sku la bzhugs par gyur te zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku la bzhugs par gyur te zhes bya ba ste /
translated: he abides in the vajra body.

original: drang ba'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los ni drang ba'i don bstan to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los ni drang ba'i don bstan to //
translated: Up to “the provisional meaning” teaches the provisional meaning with the Akṣobhya maṇḍala wheel.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ni rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid can no zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ni rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid can no zhes pa ni /
translated: The statement “the tathāgata Akṣobhya is the nature of consciousness”

original: sprul pa'i sku 'dzin pa bstan par mdzad pa yin te /
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku 'dzin pa bstan par mdzad pa yin te /
translated: teaches the enjoyment body.

original: nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od gsal ba bstan te /
analyzed: nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od gsal ba bstan te /
translated: Up to “the definitive meaning” teaches the clear light of the great pledge maṇḍala.

original: rnal 'byor pa'i bye brag brten nas nang dang phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi bye brag bstan to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i bye brag brten nas nang dang phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi bye brag bstan to //
translated: The inner and outer maṇḍala distinctions are taught based on the distinctions of the yogi.

original: da ni rdo rje 'chang chen po bskyed pa'i rim pa'i don du dang por ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: da ni rdo rje 'chang chen po bskyed pa'i rim pa'i don du dang por ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: Now, in order to generate Great Vajradhara, he first entered into meditative stabilization.

original: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis non pa'i rdo rje yin no //
analyzed: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis non pa'i rdo rje yin no //
translated: And that is the vajra that dominates all the tathāgatas.

original: 'grel pa byed pas ni spyi'i don bye brag gsum du bshad do //
analyzed: 'grel pa byed pas ni spyi'i don bye brag gsum du bshad do //
translated: The commentator explains the general meaning in three parts.

original: don de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir zhes pa nas spyi'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: don de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir zhes pa nas spyi'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: In order to clarify that very meaning, from “thus” up to “the general meaning”

original: rang bzhin gyi sems can gyi khams dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rnam par bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi sems can gyi khams dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rnam par bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: teaches the natural realm of sentient beings abiding in the maṇḍala, the creation stage.🔽“ All tathāgatas” and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs @180b pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la zhes pa ram mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs @180b pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la zhes pa ram mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: The hidden meaning is the bliss of supreme joy.

original: sbas pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'dod chags kyi chos bstan pa ste /
analyzed: sbas pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'dod chags kyi chos bstan pa ste /
translated: Up to “hidden” teaches the Dharma of passion.

original: sbas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig go //
analyzed: sbas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig go //
translated: It is one part of the hidden meaning.

original: 'dod chags kyi chos ni 'dod chags kyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi chos ni 'dod chags kyi chos nyid de /
translated: The reality of the passion is the reality of passion.

original: de yang lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo zag pa med pa'i don to //
analyzed: de yang lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo zag pa med pa'i don to //
translated: And that is the meaning of the uncontaminated essence of the innate.

original: 'dir rtsa phran stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni khong stong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'dir phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyi lus la ba sbu ji snyed pa de snyad kyi rtsa phran yod do zhes bsam pa yan na //
analyzed: 'dir rtsa phran stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni khong stong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'dir phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyi lus la ba sbu ji snyed pa de snyad kyi rtsa phran yod do zhes bsam pa yan na //
translated: Here, up to “the seventy-two thousand channels are hollow” means that here in the body, which is the nature of the five aggregates, there are as many channels as there are body hairs.

original: de dag gi khong stong ni ba sbu'i bu ga'o //
analyzed: de dag gi khong stong ni ba sbu'i bu ga'o //
translated: Their hollowness is the pores of the body hairs.

original: rdo rje ni 'dir thabs kyi ye shes zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ming ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje ni 'dir thabs kyi ye shes zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ming ngo //
translated: The vajra here is the wisdom of method, which is the name of the bodhicitta.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ni gnas par gyur zhes bya ba ni khyab par gnas so //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni gnas par gyur zhes bya ba ni khyab par gnas so //
translated: Its reality is the state of abiding, which is to say, it pervades.

original: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea is this.

original: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa'i dus su tshangs pa'i bu gnas byang chub sems kyi til mar gyi thigs bas chu la khyab pa bzhin du rtsa phran thams cad du khyab par byed do //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa'i dus su tshangs pa'i bu gnas byang chub sems kyi til mar gyi thigs bas chu la khyab pa bzhin du rtsa phran thams cad du khyab par byed do //
translated: At the time of the union of means and wisdom, the son of Brahmā, the drop of the bodhicitta oil, pervades all the minor channels, like the pervasion of water.

original: de nas man ngag dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas rdo rje'i rtse mor brten par bya ba mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de nas man ngag dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas rdo rje'i rtse mor brten par bya ba mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur pa'i bar du'o //
translated: Then, the yogin endowed with the intimate instruction experiences the supreme joy that is to be relied upon at the tip of the vajra.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Supreme joy is also of two kinds.

original: gcig ni gnyis pa'i ming gi rnam grangs so //
analyzed: gcig ni gnyis pa'i ming gi rnam grangs so //
translated: One is a synonym for the second.

original: gcig ni rnal 'byor ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ming du chags pa la 'jug go //🔽yang na mchog kyang yin la /🔽dga' ba yang yin pas na lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: gcig ni rnal 'byor ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ming du chags pa la 'jug go // yang na mchog kyang yin la / dga' ba yang yin pas na lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
translated: The other is the name of the innate joy of the yogin.🔽Or, since it is supreme and it is joy, it is innate joy.

original: yang na mchog ni pha rol gyi dga' ba ni mchog tu dga' ba ste /
analyzed: yang na mchog ni pha rol gyi dga' ba ni mchog tu dga' ba ste /
translated: Or, since the joy of the other is supreme joy,

original: tshig bar ma mi mngon par byas pa ni mar gyis gang ba'i bum pa lta bu yin pas lhan cig skyes pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: tshig bar ma mi mngon par byas pa ni mar gyis gang ba'i bum pa lta bu yin pas lhan cig skyes pa la 'jug go //
translated: The middle word is not manifest, like a pot filled with butter, and so it enters into the connate.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: All the Tathagatas, etc.,

original: mthar thug par bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyi sa ni 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa dang / zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan te /
analyzed: mthar thug par bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyi sa ni 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa dang / zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan te /
translated: up to the explanation of the ultimate is the teaching of the stage of clear light and the stage of union,

original: mthar thug pa bstan pa yang yin no //
analyzed: mthar thug pa bstan pa yang yin no //
translated: and it is also the teaching of the ultimate.🔽Thus, having generated the great Vajradhara through faith, etc., up to he said this is the definitive meaning.

original: de ltar shag par mos pas rdo rje 'chang chen po bskyed nas zhes bya ba nas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa ni nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyi bye brag gis lha'i gzugs rnam pa gnyis 'dzin🔽par bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar shag par mos pas rdo rje 'chang chen po bskyed nas zhes bya ba nas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa ni nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyi bye brag gis lha'i gzugs rnam pa gnyis 'dzin par bstan pa yin te /
translated: This teaches the two types of divine form through the distinction of interpretable and definitive meanings.

original: chos ston pa ni ched du'o zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: chos ston pa ni ched du'o zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The teaching of the Dharma is for the sake of, etc., is the remainder of the sentence.

original: 'dus pa gsang ba @181a * //🔽bshad du gsol //
analyzed: 'dus pa gsang ba @181a * // bshad du gsol //
translated: The secret assembly

original: zhes pa nas /
analyzed: zhes pa nas /
translated: is to be explained.🔽Up to

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po ste mthar thug pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po ste mthar thug pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba'o //
translated: Great Vajradhara up to the ultimate is the request by all the Tathagatas.

original: 'dus pa ni bshad pa bzhi la brten nas bshad do //🔽de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa ste zhes bya ba nas /🔽dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: 'dus pa ni bshad pa bzhi la brten nas bshad do // de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa ste zhes bya ba nas / dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: The assembly is explained based on the four explanations.

original: bskul nas dgongs pas bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi lan no //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: bskul nas dgongs pas bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi lan no // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Then means immediately after, up to the ultimate is the reply of the Bhagavān to the request with implied explanation.

original: yang dag par ston par mdzad pa ste mthar thug pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang 'chad par bskul ba yin te bshad pa'i rgyan yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par ston par mdzad pa ste mthar thug pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang 'chad par bskul ba yin te bshad pa'i rgyan yin no //
translated: The secret of the body, speech, and mind of all Tathagatas up to the ultimate is the request by all the Tathagatas to explain again, which is the ornament of explanation.

original: de ltar gsol ba btab pa dang zhes bya ba nas mthar thug pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa 'chad par bzhed nas /
analyzed: de ltar gsol ba btab pa dang zhes bya ba nas mthar thug pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa 'chad par bzhed nas /
translated: Thus, the passage beginning with having prayed in this way up to ultimate indicates that the Bhagavān, wishing to explain the assembly,

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo spro ba'i phyir dang po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to //🔽rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo spro ba'i phyir dang po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to // rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba nas /
translated: first entered into equipoise in the first meditative concentration in order to emanate the retinue.

original: yang dag par 'byin par mdzad pa ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni spro ba bstan to //
analyzed: yang dag par 'byin par mdzad pa ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni spro ba bstan to //
translated: The passage beginning with naturally luminous up to perfectly emanates is the literal explanation.

original: badzra dhrik ces bya ba ni zhes pa nas de ltar sgo rnam par bzhir bkod nas bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: badzra dhrik ces bya ba ni zhes pa nas de ltar sgo rnam par bzhir bkod nas bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: The passage beginning with vajra dhṛk up to having thus arranged the four gates indicates

original: drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyi rim pa'i sngags kyi tshig gis dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi 'khor lo spro ba bstan cing ting nge 'dzin rjes su mthun pa yang bstan to //
analyzed: drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyi rim pa'i sngags kyi tshig gis dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi 'khor lo spro ba bstan cing ting nge 'dzin rjes su mthun pa yang bstan to //
translated: the emanation of the entire wheel of the maṇḍala with the mantra words of the provisional and definitive meanings, and also teaches the concordant meditative concentration.

original: ci ste sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis dkyil 'khor bskyed dam /
analyzed: ci ste sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis dkyil 'khor bskyed dam /
translated: If one asks, Are the maṇḍalas generated with these mantra words?

original: 'on te bcom ldan 'das kyis bskyed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te bcom ldan 'das kyis bskyed pa yin zhe na /
translated: Or, is it generated by the Lord?

original: bshad pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bskyed pa yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bskyed pa yin te /
translated: It is generated by the Lord.

original: 'on kyang lha mo'i padma'i snying por thig le lhung bar byas nas /
analyzed: 'on kyang lha mo'i padma'i snying por thig le lhung bar byas nas /
translated: However, having caused the drop to fall into the heart of the lotus of the goddess,

original: sngags kyi sgra'i sgo nas lhar gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: sngags kyi sgra'i sgo nas lhar gyur pa yin te /
translated: it becomes a deity through the door of the sound of the mantra.

original: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the mandala of the Lord.

original: kha cig ni zhal gyi sgo nas sngags gsungs pa yin zhes zer te /
analyzed: kha cig ni zhal gyi sgo nas sngags gsungs pa yin zhes zer te /
translated: Some say that the mantra is uttered from the mouth.

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te ;
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te ;
translated: That is not reasonable,

original: yig 'bru rnams ni brjod ma thag tu rnam par 'jig pa yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: yig 'bru rnams ni brjod ma thag tu rnam par 'jig pa yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: because the syllables are destroyed immediately after they are uttered.

original: bde ba chen po rjes su myong ba'i dus su sngags brjod cing yang dag par byung ba ni rigs pa nyid de /
analyzed: bde ba chen po rjes su myong ba'i dus su sngags brjod cing yang dag par byung ba ni rigs pa nyid de /
translated: It is reasonable that the mantra arises at the time of experiencing great bliss.

original: de ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because that is permanent.

original: de bas na rdo rje'i lam nas spros pa ni rigs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de bas na rdo rje'i lam nas spros pa ni rigs pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable that it emanates from the vajra path.

original: shar phyogs @181b mchams  nas brtsams te zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: shar phyogs @181b mchams  nas brtsams te zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Beginning from the east...

original: 'dus pa'i don the tshom med pa la 'jug par bya ste zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: 'dus pa'i don the tshom med pa la 'jug par bya ste zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: Up to one should enter into the meaning of the assembly without doubt.
