analyzed: // / de ltar rnal 'byor pa gnyis kyi snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni le'u'i skabs ston par byed do //
translated: Thus, the section of the chapter is taught by “the essence of the two yogas” and so forth.

original: rnal 'byor pa gnyis ni brtags pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa gnyis ni brtags pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The two yogas are the yoga of the creation stage and the yoga of the perfection stage.

original: de la brtags pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni sngags kyi sku'o //
analyzed: de la brtags pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni sngags kyi sku'o //
translated: The yoga of the creation stage is the mantra body.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni ye zhes kyi sku yin te /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni ye zhes kyi sku yin te /
translated: The yoga of the perfection stage is the gnosis body.

original: de ltar 'di gnyis kyi bye brag yin no //🔽de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'di gnyis kyi bye brag yin no //🔽de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: Thus, these two are the distinctions.🔽Then, the Bhagavān, having entered the samādhi called “the essence of the vajra of the three secrets of all tathāgatas,”

original: tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni de @190b bzhin nyid dang / gzhal med khang dang / padma dang zla ba dang / nyi ma'i gdan dang lhan cig sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gzugs bskyed pa'i rim pa gsungs so //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni de @190b bzhin nyid dang / gzhal med khang dang / padma dang zla ba dang / nyi ma'i gdan dang lhan cig sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gzugs bskyed pa'i rim pa gsungs so //
translated: The meaning is that one will attain the state of Great Vajradhara in this very lifetime.🔽 Up to this point, the creation stage of the form of Great Vajradhara, which is the nature of the three beings together with the seat of suchness, the immeasurable palace, the lotus, the moon, and the sun, has been taught.

original: de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba nas sku rdo rje 'od zer bkod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags kyi sku bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba nas sku rdo rje 'od zer bkod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags kyi sku bstan pa yin no //
translated: The creation stage of the yoga of Great Vajradhara, having accomplished it in this way, up to the body vajra should be arrayed with light rays, teaches the mantra body of Vairocana.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhes pa nas dam tshig gang du 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la 'di skad ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'od dpag med kyi sku bskyed pa bstan pa yin no//🔽rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhes pa nas /
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhes pa nas dam tshig gang du 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la 'di skad ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'od dpag med kyi sku bskyed pa bstan pa yin no// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhes pa nas /
translated: The passage beginning the space-vajra and ending this is the samadhi of the pledge that occurs there teaches the generation of the body of Amitabha.

original: bya ba ni bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni mi bskyod pa'i sngags kyi sku bskyed pa bstan no //🔽de ltar brtag pa nyid kyis thun bzhir bslab pa byas nas zhes pa nas /
analyzed: bya ba ni bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni mi bskyod pa'i sngags kyi sku bskyed pa bstan no // de ltar brtag pa nyid kyis thun bzhir bslab pa byas nas zhes pa nas /
translated: The passage beginning the vajra mandala and ending the action is the generation teaches the generation of the mantra body of Akshobhya.

original: sgra ji bzhin po'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rin chen 'byung ldan dang ; don yod grub pa'i sngags kyi sku bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin po'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rin chen 'byung ldan dang ; don yod grub pa'i sngags kyi sku bskyed pa ste /
translated: Having thus trained in the four sessions by means of the visualization, the passage beginning the vajra body of Vairochana and ending just as it is teaches the generation of the mantra body of Ratnasambhava and Amoghasiddhi.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur grub na khams gsum gyi ston pa grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur grub na khams gsum gyi ston pa grub pa yin no //
translated: If one accomplishes the body of the Tathagata, one accomplishes the teacher of the three realms.

original: de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi 'bras bu'i tshul gyis zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi 'bras bu'i tshul gyis zhes pa nas /
translated: The passage beginning the yoga of such realization and ending the manner of the result teaches the manner of the result of the yoga of such realization.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'i rim pa dang / rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas /
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'i rim pa dang / rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas /
translated: The passage up to “explained by the intention” is the stage of entering into clear light and the stage of self-consecration.🔽

original: de ltar gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan cing zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de ltar gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan cing zhes pa nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the perfect abode, up to

translated: The passage from the seed-syllable placement by the creation stage up to one becomes like that teaches the consecration of the eye and so forth by the path of natural luminosity.

original: sku gsung thugs zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The passage from the commitment of the three vajras up to the great Vajradhara teaches the body, speech, and mind vajras.🔽The passage from the commitment of the three vajras up to the great Vajradhara teaches the body, speech, and mind vajras.🔽The passage from the commitment of the three vajras up to the great Vajradhara teaches the body, speech, and mind vajras.🔽The passage from the commitment of the three vajras up to the great Vajradhara teaches the body, speech, and mind vajras.🔽The passage from the commitment of the three vajras up to the great Vajradhara teaches the body, speech, and mind vajras.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rnal 'byor ba sku rnam pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i phan yon bstan to //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rnal 'byor ba sku rnam pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i phan yon bstan to //
translated: By this, up to “explained by the intention,” the benefit of the yogi endowed with the two bodies is taught.

original: le'u bcu gcig pa mtha' drug gis bshad pas bcad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bcu gcig pa mtha' drug gis bshad pas bcad pa'o /
translated: The eleventh chapter is divided by the explanation of the six limits.

original: // / de ltar las kyi lam rnam par dag pa bstan nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni le'u'i skabs bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: // / de ltar las kyi lam rnam par dag pa bstan nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni le'u'i skabs bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus, having taught the pure path of action, etc., teaches the section of the chapter.

original: de nas zhes bya ba na sa 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba yin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba na sa 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba yin no //
translated: Then, from “thereupon” up to “the characteristic explained below is spoken,” the Bhagavān speaks.

original: mkha' ni go 'byed pa'o zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: mkha' ni go 'byed pa'o zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Space is the opening, etc.,

original: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni chos ston pa'i gleng bslang bar bstan to //🔽dngos grub thams cad grub pa yin //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni chos ston pa'i gleng bslang bar bstan to // dngos grub thams cad grub pa yin //
translated: up to “not explained by the intention” teaches the introduction to the teaching of the Dharma.

original: zhes pa nas /
analyzed: zhes pa nas /
translated: All accomplishments are accomplished.

original: nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni nang dang phyi rol la brten pa'i grub pa'i gnas bstan pa'o //🔽mam zhes bya ba ni 'og nas zhes pa nas /
analyzed: nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni nang dang phyi rol la brten pa'i grub pa'i gnas bstan pa'o // mam zhes bya ba ni 'og nas zhes pa nas /
translated: The passage from the stage of accomplishment based on the inner and outer up to definitive meaning teaches the stage of accomplishment based on the inner and outer.

original: dgongs @191b pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya chen po bstan to //
analyzed: dgongs @191b pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya chen po bstan to //
translated: The passage from ma up to intention teaches Mañjuśrī's great seal.

original: de nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku yang yin no zhes bstan to //🔽de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin nye bar bstan nas zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku yang yin no zhes bstan to // de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin nye bar bstan nas zhes bya ba nas /
translated: It also teaches that he is the body of Great Vajradhara.

original: de ni 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku bstan pa yin no //
translated: Having thus taught the samādhi of the bodhisattva Mañjuśrī, the passage from thus have I heard up to the samādhi called Wheel Commitment teaches the body of the wheel-holding awareness holder.

original: dro ba dang du ba dang rab tu 'bar ba mthong na ni grub par rjes su dpag par sbyar ro //
analyzed: dro ba dang du ba dang rab tu 'bar ba mthong na ni grub par rjes su dpag par sbyar ro //
translated: If one sees warmth, smoke, and blazing, one should apply the inference of accomplishment.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhes pa nas /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhes pa nas /
translated: The passage from Great Vajradhara up to the samādhi called Wheel Commitment teaches the body of the wheel-holding awareness holder.

original: de'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: and it would be of the nature of that.🔽

original: padma'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku bstan to //🔽'od zer lnga dang lhag pa lnga dang zhes pa nas ting nge 'dzin kyang ral gri thams cad ces bya ba'i bar gyis ni /

translated: The passage from the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses up to the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses indicates the body of the lotus knowledge holder.

original: ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku bstan to //🔽de ltar 'khor lo dang rdo rje zhes pa nas /
analyzed: ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku bstan to // de ltar 'khor lo dang rdo rje zhes pa nas /
translated: The passage from the five lights and the five extras up to the samādhi of all swords indicates the body of the sword knowledge holder.

original: ldang ba'i bdag nyid can du bsam par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: ldang ba'i bdag nyid can du bsam par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: Thus, the passage from the wheel and the vajra up to the nature of arising indicates the stage of vajra repetition.

original: dgos pa ni rigs pa la mngon par zhen pa spang bar bstan to //
analyzed: dgos pa ni rigs pa la mngon par zhen pa spang bar bstan to //
translated: The purpose is to teach the abandonment of attachment to logic.

original: da ni phyag rgya chen po zhes pa nas /
analyzed: da ni phyag rgya chen po zhes pa nas /
translated: Now, the passage from the great seal up to

translated: The passage from the means of achieving power up to the means of achieving power indicates the achievement of the knowledge-holder and so forth through Vairochana, Ratnasambhava, Amitabha, Akshobhya, and Amoghasiddhi.

analyzed: dgos pa ni sems can gdul bar bya ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: The purpose is to tame sentient beings, and not anything else.

translated: It is said that one should act in this way with regard to the abode.🔽Thus it is said.🔽This is the compiler's statement.

original: yongs su shes pa tsam bstan to //
analyzed: yongs su shes pa tsam bstan to //
translated: Thus, the mere knowledge of the nature of the one who acts as Vairocana, Amitābha, and Akṣobhya is taught.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: The division of activities is taught from the division of activities up to the division of activities is explained.🔽The division of

original: rigs kyi bye brag gis bza' ba'i bya ba dang / bdud rtsis tshim par bya ba bstan to //🔽rnal 'byor pa'i bya ba'i sgo nas zhes pa nas /
analyzed: rigs kyi bye brag gis bza' ba'i bya ba dang / bdud rtsis tshim par bya ba bstan to // rnal 'byor pa'i bya ba'i sgo nas zhes pa nas /
translated: The action of eating and the satisfaction of nectar are taught by the distinctions of the families.

original: 'gyur ba ni der 'grub par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'od gsal ba las rnam par 'byung bar bstan to //🔽de ltar rdzogs pa'i cho 'phrul zhes pa nas /
analyzed: 'gyur ba ni der 'grub par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'od gsal ba las rnam par 'byung bar bstan to // de ltar rdzogs pa'i cho 'phrul zhes pa nas /
translated: From “The yoga practitioner’s action” up to “the transformation will be accomplished there” teaches the emergence from clear light.

original: 'bras bu'i phyogs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rnal 'byor pa phyag rgya chen po grub na cho 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa dang / gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa grub par bstan to //🔽gcig tu bzhugs pa'i tshig las brtsams nas zhes pa nas /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i phyogs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rnal 'byor pa phyag rgya chen po grub na cho 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa dang / gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa grub par bstan to // gcig tu bzhugs pa'i tshig las brtsams nas zhes pa nas /
translated: Thus, from “the perfect miracle” up to “the side of the result” teaches that when the yoga practitioner has accomplished the great seal, the miracles, the superknowledges, and the perfect benefit of others are accomplished.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bsnyen pa la sogs pa bskyed pa'i rim pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa bstan pa dang / bshad pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bsnyen pa la sogs pa bskyed pa'i rim pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa bstan pa dang / bshad pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: From “beginning with the words of the single abode” up to “the literal meaning” teaches the approach and so forth as branches of the creation stage and teaches the stages of explanation.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: dang po stong nyid byang chub ste //
analyzed: dang po stong nyid byang chub ste //
translated: First is emptiness enlightenment,

original: gnyis pa sa bon bsam pa yin //
analyzed: gnyis pa sa bon bsam pa yin //
translated: second is the seed contemplation,

original: gsum pa sku ni yongs bskyed pa //
analyzed: gsum pa sku ni yongs bskyed pa //
translated: third is the generation of the body,

original: bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o //
translated: fourth is the placement of the syllables.

original: zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de ltar sbyor ba bzhi'i rim gyis zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de ltar sbyor ba bzhi'i rim gyis zhes pa nas /
translated: Thus, by the sequence of the four applications,

original: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: up to “is called the perfect yoga.”

original: yan lag drug gi sbyor ba gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las bstan pa dang / bshad pa dang / rab tu bshad pa bzhin du 'grel pa byed pas rgya cher dbye ba byas pa bstan to //
analyzed: yan lag drug gi sbyor ba gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las bstan pa dang / bshad pa dang / rab tu bshad pa bzhin du 'grel pa byed pas rgya cher dbye ba byas pa bstan to //
translated: This teaches that the commentary is done by way of the six-branched yoga taught in the Continuation of the Guhyasamaja Tantra, explained, and fully explained.

original: 'on kyang de'i so sor bsdus pa dang / bsam gtan gnyis ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i so sor bsdus pa dang / bsam gtan gnyis ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa yin no //
translated: However, its two branches of retention and contemplation are the stage of the pure mind.

original: srog dang rtsol ba zhes bya bas ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba zhes bya bas ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: The phrase “vital wind and exertion” teaches the stage of vajra repetition.

original: 'dzin pa yin par zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa yin par zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The phrase “is the retention” teaches the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: rjes su dran pa ni rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa ni rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa yin no //
translated: The recollection is the stage of self-consecration.

original: ting nge 'dzin zhes bya bas ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin zhes bya bas ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: The term samādhi indicates the stage of union.

original: de nyid kyi phyir yan lag drug pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim par bstan to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir yan lag drug pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim par bstan to //
translated: Therefore, the six-branched yoga is taught as the stage of completion.

original: rnam par snang mdzad mngon @192b par byang chub pa las kyang zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad mngon @192b par byang chub pa las kyang zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Also, in the Abhisambodhi of Vairocana, it says, The six-branched yoga is the stage of completion.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni lung tshad mar byas pa bstan to //🔽de ltar lha'i rnal 'byor pa zhes pa nas /🔽nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni phyi rol dang nang gi bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sgrub pa'i gnas bstan te /
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni lung tshad mar byas pa bstan to // de ltar lha'i rnal 'byor pa zhes pa nas / nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni phyi rol dang nang gi bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sgrub pa'i gnas bstan te /
translated: Up to intentionally taught indicates the authority of scripture.🔽 Thus, the yogi, up to definitive meaning indicates the practice place of the yogi abiding in the outer and inner creation and completion stages.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor pa gnyis kyis gnas zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor pa gnyis kyis gnas zhes pa nas /
translated: Thus, the two yogis, up to the place of practice indicates the practice place of the yogi abiding in the outer and inner creation and completion stages.

original: nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rdo rje'i gzhi kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i dbye bas bstan to //🔽dus bzhi dag tu zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rdo rje'i gzhi kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i dbye bas bstan to // dus bzhi dag tu zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The passage from the definitive meaning up to the vajra basis teaches the vajra basis in terms of the division of the conventional and the ultimate.

original: sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'di dag thams cad kyang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang lhan cig bya'o zhes bstan to //🔽de ltar phun sum tshogs pa ma tshang ba med pa zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'di dag thams cad kyang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang lhan cig bya'o zhes bstan to // de ltar phun sum tshogs pa ma tshang ba med pa zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The passage from in the four times up to should be given teaches that all of these should be done together with the pledge seal.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni dus nges par chad pa las rnal 'byor pa'i grub pa bstan to //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni dus nges par chad pa las rnal 'byor pa'i grub pa bstan to //
translated: The passage from thus, the complete and perfect up to the literal meaning teaches the accomplishment of the practitioner through the definite time period.

original: zla ba phyed ni kun rdzob dang zhes pa nas dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /🔽'bras bu thob pa'i grub pa bstan to //
analyzed: zla ba phyed ni kun rdzob dang zhes pa nas dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni / 'bras bu thob pa'i grub pa bstan to //
translated: The passage from the half month is the conventional up to the intentional explanation teaches the accomplishment of attaining the result.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i rim pas zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i rim pas zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The passage from by the process just explained up to the ultimate teaches the accomplishment of the supreme result.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs mthar thug pas zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa bskul ba tsam gyis dbang du bya ste /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs mthar thug pas zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa bskul ba tsam gyis dbang du bya ste /
translated: The passage from with the ultimate body, speech, and mind up to the vajra body, and so on, of the enjoyment body and emanation body are brought under control merely by the urging,

original: bdag nyid kyi lus byin gyis brlab pa bstan to //🔽lha'i rnal 'byor rgyas pa zhes pa nas /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi lus byin gyis brlab pa bstan to // lha'i rnal 'byor rgyas pa zhes pa nas /
translated: teaches the consecration of one's own body.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po nges par bya'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po nges par bya'o //
translated: The passage from the extensive yoga of the deity up to the literal meaning teaches that one should ascertain the great seal as previously explained.

original: de ma byas na ni don med do //
analyzed: de ma byas na ni don med do //
translated: If one does not do that, it is meaningless.

original: le'u'i nges pa'i tshig kyang bshad pa yin no //🔽le'u bcu gnyis pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'i sa bcad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u'i nges pa'i tshig kyang bshad pa yin no // le'u bcu gnyis pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'i sa bcad pa'o /
translated: It also explains the etymology of the chapter.🔽The twelfth chapter is concluded.

original: // / rim pa gnyis la bslab pa la zhes pa la sogs pas le'u skabs ston par byed do //
analyzed: // / rim pa gnyis la bslab pa la zhes pa la sogs pas le'u skabs ston par byed do //
translated: The passage from the training in the two stages up to the chapter on the wheel of the mandala indicates the topic of the chapter.

original: de nas zhes pa nas sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: de nas zhes pa nas sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: The passage from then up to the literal meaning teaches the wheel of the mandala.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha mo rnams kyis mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sgo nas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha mo rnams kyis mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sgo nas /
translated: The buddhas, bodhisattvas, and goddesses, having first made offerings,

original: chos bshad par bcom ldan 'das la bskul ba yin no //
analyzed: chos bshad par bcom ldan 'das la bskul ba yin no //
translated: urge the Bhagavān to explain the Dharma.🔽“Ah!” is the exclamation.

original: ae ma'o zhes pa ni zhes pa nas dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sngar bshad pa'i yan lag drug gi sbyor ba la rjes su yi rang ba'i sgo nas /
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes pa ni zhes pa nas dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sngar bshad pa'i yan lag drug gi sbyor ba la rjes su yi rang ba'i sgo nas /
translated: From “the six-branched yoga explained above” up to “non-intentional explanation” shows that the retinue encourages the Bhagavān to teach the Dharma through rejoicing in the practice of the six-branched yoga explained above.🔽“Bhagavān,🔽please teach the Dharma.”

original: bcom ldan 'das chos @193a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das chos @193a * //
translated: From “thus praised” up to

original: ston pa la 'khor rnams kyis spro ba bskyed par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: ston pa la 'khor rnams kyis spro ba bskyed par bstan pa yin no //
translated: “the Bhagavān explained” shows that the retinue requests the Bhagavān to teach the Dharma.

original: de ltar bstod pas zhes pa nas //
analyzed: de ltar bstod pas zhes pa nas //
translated: From “thus requested” up to

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol //
translated: “the Bhagavān replied” shows that the Bhagavān accepts the request of the retinue.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i bzlas ba bshad par bskul ba bstan to //🔽gang gi phyir las kyi sbyor ba la ni bzlas pas 'grub pa yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i bzlas ba bshad par bskul ba bstan to //🔽gang gi phyir las kyi sbyor ba la ni bzlas pas 'grub pa yin la /
translated: “the Bhagavān replied” shows that the Bhagav

original: de'i de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa'i rdo rje bzlas pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gus pa cher mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: de'i de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa'i rdo rje bzlas pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gus pa cher mdzad pa ste /
translated: In vajra repetition, which is the thorough knowledge of the reality of that, the Tathagatas have great respect.

original: de kho na nyid shes pa la ni grub pa thams cad lag na yod pa yin no zhes pa'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: de kho na nyid shes pa la ni grub pa thams cad lag na yod pa yin no zhes pa'i rigs pas so //
translated: By the reasoning that “all powers are in the hand of one who knows reality,”

original: de nas ni zhes pa las /
analyzed: de nas ni zhes pa las /
translated: Then, from “then”

original: nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: up to “definitive meaning,”

original: mchod pa'i rim pa dang rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa bcu bstan to //
analyzed: mchod pa'i rim pa dang rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa bcu bstan to //
translated: the stages of worship and the ten stages of vajra repetition are taught.

original: kha cig ni mos pa'i bye brag gis so zhes bcad do //
analyzed: kha cig ni mos pa'i bye brag gis so zhes bcad do //
translated: Some are by the distinctions of interest.

original: bdag gi bla ma ni gong nas gong du khyad par gyi go 'phang yin no zhes 'chad do //
analyzed: bdag gi bla ma ni gong nas gong du khyad par gyi go 'phang yin no zhes 'chad do //
translated: My guru explains that it is the stage of a special level higher and higher.

original: de nyid kyi phyi ma ni yi ge bzlas pa tha mar bshad de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyi ma ni yi ge bzlas pa tha mar bshad de /
translated: The next one after that explains the end of the repetition of the syllables.

original: de ni 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because it is the nature of clear light.🔽Moreover, from “concentration” up to “should be cultivated”

original: gzhan yang bsam gtan zhes pa nas bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gtan zhes pa nas bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: teaches

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku dag gi sngags kyi rim pas /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku dag gi sngags kyi rim pas /
translated: The stages of the mantras of the bodies of Vairochana and so forth

original: nad la sogs pa zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi sbyor ba bstan to //
analyzed: nad la sogs pa zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi sbyor ba bstan to //
translated: teach the performance of the activities of pacifying illness and so forth.🔽This very [mantra] is the remainder of the ritual... up to... the uncommon reality for beginners.

original: 'di nyid ni cho ga'i lhag ma'i zhes pa nas las dang po ba rnams kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i de kho na nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rdo rje 'chang chen po bsgoms pas /🔽dkyil 'khor bzhi las byung ba'i 'od zer dkar po'i tshogs kyis /
analyzed: 'di nyid ni cho ga'i lhag ma'i zhes pa nas las dang po ba rnams kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i de kho na nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rdo rje 'chang chen po bsgoms pas / dkyil 'khor bzhi las byung ba'i 'od zer dkar po'i tshogs kyis /
translated: By meditating on Great Vajradhara,

original: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi sbyor ba bstan to //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi sbyor ba bstan to //
translated: the performance of the activities of pacifying and so forth is taught by the assembly of white light rays arising from the four maṇḍalas.🔽These very four vajras... up to... the secret one.

original: rdo rje bzhi po 'di dag nyid la zhes bya ba nas gsang ba po'i zhes bya bar sbyar ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i spros pa bstan to //
analyzed: rdo rje bzhi po 'di dag nyid la zhes bya ba nas gsang ba po'i zhes bya bar sbyar ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i spros pa bstan to //
translated: This teaches the emanation of the four maṇḍalas explained above.

original: las rnam pa bzhi'i nang nas zhes pa nas de yongs su gyur par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: las rnam pa bzhi'i nang nas zhes pa nas de yongs su gyur par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: From within the four types of activities... up to... that should transform.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: Having gone before all the Tathagatas' samadhis,

original: khro bo'i tshogs spros pas mngon spyod kyi las bstan to //
analyzed: khro bo'i tshogs spros pas mngon spyod kyi las bstan to //
translated: the wrathful assembly emanated and taught the activity of destroying.

original: 'dir 'bru mar ni yungs mar ro //
analyzed: 'dir 'bru mar ni yungs mar ro //
translated: Here, the oil is mustard oil.

original: de'i 'khor rnams kyis yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba @193b nas ;
analyzed: de'i 'khor rnams kyis yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba @193b nas ;
translated: In order to teach that, the retinue...

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: up to...just as it is.

original: lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis khro bo'am /
analyzed: lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis khro bo'am /
translated: The goddesses and Bodhisattvas emanated the assembly of wrathful ones,

original: yang na de las gyur pa'i khro bos bka'i tshogs spros pas bstan to //
analyzed: yang na de las gyur pa'i khro bos bka'i tshogs spros pas bstan to //
translated: or the wrathful ones that arose from them, and taught.

original: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa zhes pa nas /
analyzed: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa zhes pa nas /
translated: Now, those abiding in the stage of completion...

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: up to...intentional speech.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor pa'i mngon spyod bstan to //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor pa'i mngon spyod bstan to //
translated: The activity of the yogi abiding in the stage of completion is taught.

original: rengs par bya ba'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir zhes pa nas /
analyzed: rengs par bya ba'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir zhes pa nas /
translated: In order to teach the rite of immobilization...🔽up to...

original: sbyor ba yang dag par bstan pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: sbyor ba yang dag par bstan pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: By the passage up to “the teaching of the performance,”

original: chu dang gzhan rgol ba'i tshig dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams la rim pa gnyis kyi rengs pa bstan to //
analyzed: chu dang gzhan rgol ba'i tshig dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams la rim pa gnyis kyi rengs pa bstan to //
translated: the immobilization of water, the words of the opponent, and the army of the enemy are taught in two stages.

original: h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes bya ba nas /
translated: By the passage beginning with “hum” and so on up to

original: ting nge 'dzin gang ston pa de la de skad ces bya'o zhes pa ba'i bar gyis ni phur bu'i cho ga bstan to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang ston pa de la de skad ces bya'o zhes pa ba'i bar gyis ni phur bu'i cho ga bstan to //
translated: “the samadhi that teaches that is called by that name,” the rite of the dagger is taught.

original: de yang khyab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang khyab pa'i phyir /
translated: And that is all-pervading,

original: bgegs la bya ba bzhin du dgra la yang bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bgegs la bya ba bzhin du dgra la yang bya ba yin no //
translated: so just as with the obstructor, it is also to be done with the enemy.

original: bdud la sogs pa'i rnam par 'tshe ba zhes pa nas ting nge 'dzin de la yang de skad ces bya ba'i bar gyis ni zhi ba chen por bstan to //
analyzed: bdud la sogs pa'i rnam par 'tshe ba zhes pa nas ting nge 'dzin de la yang de skad ces bya ba'i bar gyis ni zhi ba chen por bstan to //
translated: By the passage beginning with “the harm of Mara and so on” up to “the samadhi that is called by that name,” the great peace is taught.

original: bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhes bya ba nas /
translated: By the passage beginning with “the dhyana called” up to

original: gang du de ston pa de la yang de skad ces bya ba'i bar gyis ni bgegs bskrad pa bstan te /
analyzed: gang du de ston pa de la yang de skad ces bya ba'i bar gyis ni bgegs bskrad pa bstan te /
translated: “the samadhi that teaches that is called by that name,” the expulsion of the obstructor is taught.

original: sngar bshad pa'i spros pa yin no //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i spros pa yin no //
translated: as previously explained.

original: yang na sngar bstan pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi yul lo //
analyzed: yang na sngar bstan pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi yul lo //
translated: Or else, the previously taught [mandala] is the object of meditative concentration,

original: 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi yul lo //
analyzed: 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi yul lo //
translated: and this [mandala] is the object of the maṇḍala.

original: zhi ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: zhi ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: With peaceful and so forth up to

original: de la yang de skad ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: de la yang de skad ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: that is also called thus,

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i skur byas la bsgrub bya bsdu ba sngon du byas nas /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i skur byas la bsgrub bya bsdu ba sngon du byas nas /
translated: having created the body of Vairocana and so forth, and having previously gathered the disciples,

original: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi sbyor ba bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi sbyor ba bstan pa yin no //
translated: the application of the rites of pacification and so forth is taught.

original: gzhan yang sngar bshad pa'i kha rnams zhes pa nas /
analyzed: gzhan yang sngar bshad pa'i kha rnams zhes pa nas /
translated: Moreover, with the faces previously explained and so forth up to

original: ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: the explanation of countless meditative concentrations,

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i zhal dang / phyag la sogs pa'i dbye ba bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i zhal dang / phyag la sogs pa'i dbye ba bstan pa yin no //
translated: the divisions of the faces, arms, and so forth of Vairocana and so forth together with their retinues are taught.

original: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i lha rnams bskyed par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i lha rnams bskyed par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Now, in order to generate the deities of the completion stage, with the body of Vairocana and so forth up to🔽the body of Amoghasiddhi,🔽the generation of the deities of the completion stage is taught.

original: ting nge 'dzin de la de skad ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la de skad ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: This is what that meditative stabilization is called.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bskyed pa bstan to //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bskyed pa bstan to //
translated: Up to this point, it teaches the generation stage of the self-consecration process of Vairochana and so forth.

original: de ltar rim pa gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin rim par bstan nas zhes pa nas @194a * //
analyzed: de ltar rim pa gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin rim par bstan nas zhes pa nas @194a * //
translated: Having thus taught the two stages of meditative stabilization in sequence,

original: nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: up to the definitive meaning.

original: rim pa gnyis kyi mjug bsdu ba bstan to //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis kyi mjug bsdu ba bstan to //
translated: Up to this point, it teaches the conclusion of the two stages.

original: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa nas /🔽le'u'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa nas / le'u'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: The vajra is the Tathagata,🔽up to the chapter.

original: don dang ldan pa'i le'u bstan to //
analyzed: don dang ldan pa'i le'u bstan to //
translated: Up to this point, it teaches the chapter that has the meaning.

original: le'u bcu gsum pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'i sa bcad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bcu gsum pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'i sa bcad pa'o /
translated: The thirteenth chapter is the explanation of the six limits.

original: // / da ni sngags smra ba rnam pa bzhi'i rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: // / da ni sngags smra ba rnam pa bzhi'i rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Now, following the four kinds of mantra speakers, and so forth,

original: le'u'i skabs ston pa yin no //
analyzed: le'u'i skabs ston pa yin no //
translated: teaches the context of the chapter.

original: de la dang por las kyi tshogs rnams kyi go rims ni zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de la dang por las kyi tshogs rnams kyi go rims ni zhes pa nas /
translated: Therein, first, the sequence of the collections of rites,

original: las rnams bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: las rnams bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: up to the rites should be performed.

original: khyad par te zhes bya ba'i par gyis ni phyogs dang / dus dang ; kha dog dang / sems kyi gnas skabs kyi bye brag lung tshad ma yin par bstan to //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bshad pa'i rgyud las zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: khyad par te zhes bya ba'i par gyis ni phyogs dang / dus dang ; kha dog dang / sems kyi gnas skabs kyi bye brag lung tshad ma yin par bstan to // bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bshad pa'i rgyud las zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The word especially indicates that the scriptures are valid with regard to the distinctions of direction, time, color, and mental state.🔽From the tantra explained by the Bhagavān up to at that time one should perform the fierce action, it shows that one should focus on the inner meaning according to the very stages of the explanatory tantra.🔽Now, from one should enter the chapter up to the concise one was extracted and spoken, it shows that one should enter the chapter of the concise one.

original: rtog pa'i rnal 'byor yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /🔽bcom ldan 'das dang po'i gnas la brten nas rigs lnga'i rnal 'byor pas /
analyzed: rtog pa'i rnal 'byor yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni / bcom ldan 'das dang po'i gnas la brten nas rigs lnga'i rnal 'byor pas /
translated: because of being a yoga of imagination.🔽The Bhagavān, based on the first abode, taught the offering by means of the yoga of the five families,

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs pas mchod pa bstan to //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs pas mchod pa bstan to //
translated: through union with the pledge seal.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang rigs dang kha dog gis bstan to //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang rigs dang kha dog gis bstan to //
translated: The pledge seal is also taught by means of family and color.

original: de ltar rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de ltar rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi zhes pa nas /
translated: Thus, those who are yogis of imagination, etc.🔽up to🔽is an explanation by way of the intention.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs pa dang mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa dang / rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs pa dang mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa dang / rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: This teaches the union with the seal, the stage of manifest enlightenment, and the stage of self-consecration of the yogi who has entered the stage of completion.🔽Thus, Great Vajradhara, etc.

original: de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes pa nas /
translated: up to

original: 'di dag thams cad rdzogs par bya //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad rdzogs par bya //
translated: all of these should be completed.

original: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni gshin rje gshed kyi sngags dang / de bsgoms pas dgra gsad par bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni gshin rje gshed kyi sngags dang / de bsgoms pas dgra gsad par bstan to //
translated: By this much, the mantra of Yamântaka and the killing of the enemy by meditating on him are taught.

original: h'um ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes pa nas bsam gtan nyid kyis thams cad rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: h'um ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes pa nas bsam gtan nyid kyis thams cad rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: By the section beginning with “Hum” and so on up to “all is accomplished by concentration alone,”

original: khro bo gnod mdzes kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis /
analyzed: khro bo gnod mdzes kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis /
translated: the meditative stabilization of Krodha Ucchusma

original: ma lus pa 'jig par byed pa'o //🔽rdo rgyus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes pa nas /
analyzed: ma lus pa 'jig par byed pa'o // rdo rgyus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes pa nas /
translated: destroys everything without exception.🔽By the section beginning with “pestle” and so on up to “there is no doubt about this,”

original: 'di la gdon mi za'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni gshin rje gshed kyi skur bskyed nas /
analyzed: 'di la gdon mi za'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni gshin rje gshed kyi skur bskyed nas /
translated: having generated the body of Yamântaka,

original: gsang ba bstan to //
analyzed: gsang ba bstan to //
translated: the secret is taught.

original: las kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes bya ba nas char gnon pa la mchog tu khyad par @196a * //
analyzed: las kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes bya ba nas char gnon pa la mchog tu khyad par @196a * //
translated: By the section beginning with “karmavajra” and so on up to “supremely distinguished in stopping rain,”

original: du 'phags pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bsgoms pas tshar gcod pa bstan to //
analyzed: du 'phags pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bsgoms pas tshar gcod pa bstan to //
translated: the destruction by meditating on Krodha Amrtakundalin is taught.

original: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The section beginning with mandala and ending with

original: phat ni gsad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: phat ni gsad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: phat is for killing

original: khro bo rta mgrin bsgoms pas rlung la sogs pa'i bgegs bskyed par bzlog pa bstan to //
analyzed: khro bo rta mgrin bsgoms pas rlung la sogs pa'i bgegs bskyed par bzlog pa bstan to //
translated: teaches the prevention of the generation of obstacles such as wind and so forth by meditating on the wrathful Hayagriva.

original: da ni gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba nas /
analyzed: da ni gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba nas /
translated: Now, beginning with the reality of the five secrets and ending with

original: de la sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rnal 'byor pa'i phyag rgya bzhis yongs su bskor cing /
analyzed: de la sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rnal 'byor pa'i phyag rgya bzhis yongs su bskor cing /
translated: the samadhi called the vajra that generates all heroes,

original: snyoms par zhugs pa'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga grub par bstan to //
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs pa'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga grub par bstan to //
translated: teaches the accomplishment of the five tathagatas by means of the four mudras of the yogi and🔽entering into union.

original: da ni phyag rgya gcig dang yang lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: da ni phyag rgya gcig dang yang lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Now, beginning with the single mudra and also the practice and ending with🔽the samadhi called the vajra of the single hero,🔽teaches the accomplishment of the single hero.

original: nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can gyi don rdzogs par byed de zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni phyag rgya gcig pa'i rim pas rnal 'byor pa rdo rje 'chang chen po grub par bstan to //
analyzed: nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can gyi don rdzogs par byed de zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni phyag rgya gcig pa'i rim pas rnal 'byor pa rdo rje 'chang chen po grub par bstan to //
translated: Up to this point, by the stage of the single seal, the practitioner has been taught to accomplish Great Vajradhara.

original: da ni sgrub pa po zas kyi bya ba zhes pa nas /
analyzed: da ni sgrub pa po zas kyi bya ba zhes pa nas /
translated: Now, from “The practitioner’s food activity” up to

original: de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: “Thus have I spoken,”

original: sgrub pa po'i zas bsang par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa po'i zas bsang par bya ba yin no //
translated: the practitioner’s food is to be purified.🔽“

original: 'og nas bshad pa la ltos pa yin no zhes pa nas /
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa la ltos pa yin no zhes pa nas /
translated: It is dependent on what is explained below” up to

original: sdud par byed pa'i tshig go zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: sdud par byed pa'i tshig go zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: “the summarizing words”

original: rnal 'byor bas ri lu'i rim pas mi snang ba la sogs pa phan yon dang bcas pa bstan to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bas ri lu'i rim pas mi snang ba la sogs pa phan yon dang bcas pa bstan to //
translated: teaches the benefits of invisibility and so on by the stage of the pill for the practitioner.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes pa nas /
translated: Then, from “Thus have I spoken” up to

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: “the intentional explanation,”

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rdo rje 'chang chen pos gzhal bar mdzad pa la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rdo rje 'chang chen pos gzhal bar mdzad pa la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad pa'o //
translated: One should rejoice in the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas being measured by Great Vajradhara.

original: da ni rigs kyi dbye bas rang gi lha zhes pa nas /
analyzed: da ni rigs kyi dbye bas rang gi lha zhes pa nas /
translated: Now, by the division of the families, one's own deity, etc.,

original: de sgrub cing skyed par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: de sgrub cing skyed par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: up to one should accomplish and generate

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo dang / khro bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'i rtags cod pan bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo dang / khro bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'i rtags cod pan bya ba bstan to //
translated: teaches the consecration sign of the Tathagatas, goddesses, wrathful ones, and Bodhisattvas.

original: da ni snod la dbab pa'i cho ga zhes pa nas /
analyzed: da ni snod la dbab pa'i cho ga zhes pa nas /
translated: Now, the ritual of descent into the vessel, etc.,

original: cho ga la sogs pas bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: cho ga la sogs pas bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: up to one should protect with the ritual, etc.

original: rnal 'byor pa rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms pas slob ma sa bon bzhi rnam par bkod pa'i rim pas /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms pas slob ma sa bon bzhi rnam par bkod pa'i rim pas /
translated: The yogin, having meditated on Vajrasattva, by the stage of the arrangement of the four seed syllables of the disciple,

original: rdo rje dbab pa bstan to //
analyzed: rdo rje dbab pa bstan to //
translated: teaches the descent of the vajra.

original: 'dir dgos pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi dgos pa grub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir dgos pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi dgos pa grub pa yin no //
translated: Here, the purpose is the accomplishment of one's own and others' needs.

original: de ltar gnad la dbab pa @196b zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de ltar gnad la dbab pa @196b zhes pa nas /
translated: Thus, the descent of the vital essence, etc.,🔽up to one should generate the vajra body, etc.

original: 'ug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: 'ug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: The words “owl” and so forth are easy to understand.

original: sems can ma rungs pa rnams la mngon spyod kyi rdzas gnod sbyin dang / srin pa du ma gsod par byed pa bstan to //🔽sbrul nag ces bya ba la sogs pa zhes pa nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rnal 'byor ba gshin rje gshed du bskyed nas /
analyzed: sems can ma rungs pa rnams la mngon spyod kyi rdzas gnod sbyin dang / srin pa du ma gsod par byed pa bstan to // sbrul nag ces bya ba la sogs pa zhes pa nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rnal 'byor ba gshin rje gshed du bskyed nas /
translated: The passage from “owl” up to “easy to understand” explains the substances of the subjugation rite for evil beings, which kill many yakṣas and rākṣasas.

original: sprul la sogs pa spros pas ma rungs pa gsod par bstan to //🔽gsod pa'i yul 'di la zhes pa nas /🔽sdud par byed pa'i tshig go zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: sprul la sogs pa spros pas ma rungs pa gsod par bstan to // gsod pa'i yul 'di la zhes pa nas / sdud par byed pa'i tshig go zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: The passage from “black snake” up to “Great Vajradhara” explains the killing of evil beings by the yogi who has generated himself as Yamāntaka and emanated snakes and so on.

original: rnal 'byor ba rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pas kyang /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pas kyang /
translated: The passage from “This is the object of killing” up to “the summarizing words” explains the killing by the yogi who abides in the stage of completion.

original: gsod pa rnam par dag pas kyang /🔽gsod par byed pa bstan to //🔽de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes pa nas /
analyzed: gsod pa rnam par dag pas kyang / gsod par byed pa bstan to // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes pa nas /
translated: The killing is pure.

original: de'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: The passage from “Then” up to “skilled in its characteristics” explains the killing of the evil one by the yogi who abides in the stage of generation.

original: sprul la sogs pa spros nas dug gi zin par byas te /
analyzed: sprul la sogs pa spros nas dug gi zin par byas te /
translated: Having emanated the emanations and so forth, he causes them to be seized by poison.

original: ma rungs pa gsod par byed pa bstan to //
analyzed: ma rungs pa gsod par byed pa bstan to //
translated: He demonstrates the killing of the wicked.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhes pa nas /
translated: Therein, and so forth refers to the following:

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni dug 'pho bar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni dug 'pho bar bstan pa yin no //
translated: From the great Vajradhara up to the great Vajradhara demonstrates the transference of poison.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni zhes pa nas /🔽gsang chen de sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni zhes pa nas / gsang chen de sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: Therein, and so forth refers to the following:

original: dug dang nye ba'i dug gi gso ba bstan to //
analyzed: dug dang nye ba'i dug gi gso ba bstan to //
translated: From the great secret up to the secret of the Buddhas demonstrates the cure for poison and secondary poison.

original: dang por gnas skabs kyi 'brel pa zhes pa nas /
analyzed: dang por gnas skabs kyi 'brel pa zhes pa nas /
translated: First, the connection of the occasion is as follows:

original: de ltar byas pas nad las thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: de ltar byas pas nad las thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: From thus up to the great Vajradhara demonstrates the cure for poison and secondary poison.

original: nad pa'i nad bsal nas sangs rgyas kyis kyang byin gyis brlab ba bstan to //
analyzed: nad pa'i nad bsal nas sangs rgyas kyis kyang byin gyis brlab ba bstan to //
translated: Having removed the disease of the patient, the Buddha also bestows his blessing.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyi zhes pa nas /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyi zhes pa nas /
translated: From those abiding in the stage of completion up to the great Vajradhara demonstrates the cure for poison and secondary poison.🔽From the great Vajradhara up to the great Vajradhara demonstrates the transference of poison.🔽Therein, and so forth refers to the following:🔽 From the great secret up to the secret of the Buddhas demonstrates the cure for poison and secondary poison.🔽First, the connection of the occasion is as follows:

original: rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal ba yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal ba yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: From thus up to the great Vajradhara demonstrates the cure for poison and secondary poison.🔽Having removed the disease of the patient, the Buddha also bestows his blessing.🔽 From those abiding in the stage of completion up to the great Vajradhara demonstrates the cure for poison and secondary poison.

original: rnal 'byor pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa yang /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa yang /
translated: The yogi who abides in the stage of completion

original: nad kyi gso ba byed pa'am gsod par byed pa bstan to //
analyzed: nad kyi gso ba byed pa'am gsod par byed pa bstan to //
translated: is shown to be the one who heals or kills.🔽Having explained the collection of activities,

original: de ltar las kyi tshogs rnams bshad nas zhes pa nas yang ba ma spangs pas dus byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: de ltar las kyi tshogs rnams bshad nas zhes pa nas yang ba ma spangs pas dus byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: from “thus” up to “one who does not abandon the light will die”

original: ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa'i 'dod pa dang / mi 'dod pa'i rmi lam du mthong ba dang / de'i 'bras bu bstan to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa'i 'dod pa dang / mi 'dod pa'i rmi lam du mthong ba dang / de'i 'bras bu bstan to //
translated: teaches the desired and undesired dreams of one who has entered into meditative concentration and the result of those.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa las zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa las zhes pa nas /
translated: “ In that,” and so on, up to “karma”🔽teaches the result of the dream.

original: de las dngos grub thams cad rjes su rtogs par bya zhing khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /🔽rmi lam dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i @197a * //
analyzed: de las dngos grub thams cad rjes su rtogs par bya zhing khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni / rmi lam dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i @197a * //
translated: “ In that,” and so on, up to “one should understand and comprehend all powers from that”🔽teaches the result of the wish-fulfilling jewel.🔽The example of the wish-fulfilling jewel

original: dpes ; sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi the tshom du gyur pa la /
analyzed: dpes ; sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi the tshom du gyur pa la /
translated: teaches the result of the dream.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid gsungs so //
translated: The Blessed One, Great Vajradhara, has taught the thatness of all phenomena.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhes pa nas /
translated: Then, from “thus” and so on,

original: sdud par byed pa'i tshig ste zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: sdud par byed pa'i tshig ste zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: up to “the words of the compiler,”

original: zhus pa'i lan gyi sgo nas ston pa pos sngags dang grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / lus la sogs pa dang / nam mkha' rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar bstan to //
analyzed: zhus pa'i lan gyi sgo nas ston pa pos sngags dang grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / lus la sogs pa dang / nam mkha' rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar bstan to //
translated: the teacher has explained the intrinsic luminosity of mantras, accomplishments, the qualities of buddhahood, the body and so on, and space through the reply to the question.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni zhes pa nas gyur to zhes bya ba ni de ltar gyur ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'khor rnams the tshom chod par gyur nas mi smra bar 'khod par bstan to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni zhes pa nas gyur to zhes bya ba ni de ltar gyur ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'khor rnams the tshom chod par gyur nas mi smra bar 'khod par bstan to //
translated: “ Those buddhas and bodhisattvas were amazed” and so on, up to “thus it is” indicates that the retinue, having had their doubts resolved, remained silent.

original: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba zhes pa nas /
analyzed: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba zhes pa nas /
translated: “ The moving and unmoving” and so on,🔽up to “the nature of the mind” indicates the intrinsic luminosity of the body and so on.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni le'u'i don dang ldan pa'i ming bstan to //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni le'u'i don dang ldan pa'i ming bstan to //
translated: The phrase explained by the intention indicates the name endowed with the meaning of the chapter.

original: le'u bco lnga pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'i sa bcad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bco lnga pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'i sa bcad pa'o /
translated: The fifteenth chapter is the summary of the ground explained by the six limits.

original: // / sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni le'u'i rtsom pa bstan to //
analyzed: // / sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni le'u'i rtsom pa bstan to //
translated: The phrase the characteristics explained previously and so on indicates the composition of the chapter.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la zhes pa nas lhag ma'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bstod pa la /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la zhes pa nas lhag ma'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bstod pa la /
translated: The phrase then the Bhagavān and so on up to the remainder indicates the praise preceded by offerings,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskul ba bstan to ;🔽/ rdo rje thams cad ni zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskul ba bstan to ; / rdo rje thams cad ni zhes pa nas /
translated: which demonstrates the request of the tathāgatas.

original: 'od dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: 'od dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: The phrase all vajras and so on up to the maṇḍala of Amitābha

original: khru bcu drug dang / khru nyi shu'i sku dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa dang / mchod par bcas pa bstan to //
analyzed: khru bcu drug dang / khru nyi shu'i sku dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa dang / mchod par bcas pa bstan to //
translated: indicates the characteristics of the maṇḍalas of body and speech, sixteen cubits and twenty cubits, and the offerings.

original: de ltar sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa nas /
analyzed: de ltar sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa nas /
translated: Thus, the mandala of body, speech, and mind,

original: gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
analyzed: gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
translated: that which is so called,
